1b1(mdo): oM// rgya gar gang du/ lo ka prad nya pa ti/ bod skad du/ 'jig ces bzhag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag
1b2(mdo): 'tshal lo// mdol// rirnams dang ni rgya mchod pa// ngan song rnams dang gling dang shing // klu rgyal dang ninam mkha
1b3(mdo): sding // rgyal chen 'gro dang 'dunas rnams// de skad bdag kyis thos pa'i dus cig ma// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
1b4(mdo): na// rgyal bu rgyal byed gi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gi kun dka' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
1b5(mdo): kyis dge' slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'a slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gsum po 'di dag yin te/ gsu
1b6(mdo): po rnams gang zhe na/ stong kyi phung gi 'jig rten gi khams/ stong gnyis pa bar ma 'jig rten gi khams dang / stong gsum gi stong
1b7(mdo): chen po 'jig rten gi khams so// stong spyi phung gi 'jig rteki khams gang zhe na/ jim du stong pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyis rnam par
1b8(mdo): lda ldan pas bdum 'kho 'i l+ya'o/ sa pa'i byed pa ngasrab stong dpa l+leb stong ngamari'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang /
1b9(mdo): sharang gi lus lags po steng da kring song dang rab gi kham la sod stong dang / byang gi swA
2a1(mdo): snyan stong dang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams steng dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa stong dang / mtha' bral stong dang / dga' ldan stong dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang
2a2(mdo): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong ste/ dge' slong dag 'di ni steng spyi phung gi 'jig rten gi khams zhes bya'o// stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gi khams gang zhe na/ stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la
2a3(mdo): la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gi khams zhes bya'o// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong gnyis pa bar ma 'jig rten gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig
2a4(mdo): rten gi khams zhes bya'o// dge' slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams rnams shar phyogs su mtha' myed cing mu myed la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing chags pa 'am
2a5(mdo): chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan chags shing gzhan chags par gnas so// dge' slong/ dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams rnams
2a6(mdo): lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su mtha' myed cing mu myed la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan 'jig par gnas la gzhan chags shing gzhan
2a7(mdo): chags par gnas so// dge' slong dag dper na bar snang las char 'bab pa'i 'bru shing rta'i srog cing tsam 'bab ste/ chu'i rgyud rnams rab du 'bab pa na/ mtshams sam bar chad myed pa de bzhin du dge' slong dag ngas
2a8(mdo): lha'i myig rnam par dag par myi las 'das pas/ shar phyogs su de ltar bu'i stong gsum gi stong gsum na chen po 'jig rten ka khams mtha' myed cing mu myed la 'jigs pa 'am zhig par gnas shing chags pa dang /
2a9(mdo): de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang gi tshogs su de snyed gi stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi kham+b+has rnams mtha' myed cing mu myed la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing 'chags pa'am chags par gnas te/
2b1(mdo): gzhan 'jig cing gnas 'jig par gnas pa/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas par dag kyang mthong ngo // zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag par 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so//
2b2(mdo): de'i tshe na che dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gi bu ya na chen po 'khor de nyid gi nang du 'dus par gyur da te 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ya na chen pos/ dge' slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji tsam d+ya/
2b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstand pa 'di ni legs te ngo mtshar to// de la stong spyi phud 'jig rten gi khams na ri chen po nyis stong yod do// ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong
2b4(mdo): dang / 'khor yug 'i stong rnams so// stong spyi phung gi 'jig rten gi san rgyam mchen po nyis stong yo dang / nang gi khams ni mchen mo nyis srong dang / phyi'i rgyamatsho chen po stong rnams so// stong ste phung gi lan
2b5(mdo): tenang gi khams na/ ngan song sum stong yod / sems can dbya/ la ba stong dung 'gro stong / yi dgas song rnams so// slong / spyi phud gi 'jig rten gi khams na/ gling chen po zin das
2b6(mdo): ring/ sus na pa po rna slo dang / 'dus tha mi dang / su smrad skyong dang / nga gi m+b+ha mi snyan thong rnams so// gong skyes gi 'jig sbyin ni mas //
2b7(mdo): dang / lam bu ming po'i gling 'dus cu song dang / nasu gags pa 'i mngon pa 'dzi dang / gangs gi rdza ba ta 'i stong dang / sum brgyas gsum pa'i sa gnol skyong rnams
2b8(mdo): spyi bud gi 'jig rten ge khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong yod de/ klu'i rigs sgo nga las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang / dror gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi phung 'jis
2b9(mdo): rten gi khams na/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong yod de/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so
3a1(mdo): stong spyi bud 'jig rten gi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi stong yod de/ yul 'khor bsrung 'khar bstod dang / 'phags skyes po stong dang / dmyig mi bzang stong dang / rnam thos gi bu stong rnams so//
3a2(mdo): stong spyi phung gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang / mye'i 'gro ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gi khams na/ 'dun
3a3(mdo): sa chen po nyis stong yod de/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs stong dang / lha ma yin gi 'dun sa nor bzangs shes bya ba stong rnams so// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs dang po'o// /
3a4(mdo): mdo' las// skye gnas ri dang rol mtsho dang / de bzhin sems can dmyal brgyad gzhan // sems can dmyal gnas dgur rab ba shad de// las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig
3a5(mdo): rten gi khams na/ 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum dang yod de// gsum gang zhe na/ sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams la dbang phyug gyis dbang byed
3a6(mdo): pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste myi kha cig dang / lha rnams so// 'di ni skye / nas dang ba'o// sems can 'dor pa sprul pa dag yod de/ ka ngag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di
3a7(mdo): lta ste/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan gis sprul pa dang / gan ga gzha kyi sprus panasasas tu bye dag gi nyi pazhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams so// 'di na
3a8(mdo): 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phung gi 'jig rten gi khams na/ bde' ba'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed cing yongs/
3a9(mdo): su brlan par byed de/ yongs su 'tshig par byed cing yongs su khyab par byed pa dag kyang yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dben pa las brlan par byas shing yongs su brlan par byas te/
3b1(mdo): yongs su tshim par byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas nas/ bde bar reg par gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris gi lha rnams so//
3b2(mdo): ko'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di la ting nge 'dzin nga las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang / bde ba 'arlam par byed cing yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod na
3b3(mdo): de dag lus 'di nyid las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bar brlan par byas zhing yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas bde bar theg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang
3b4(mdo): bde' ba la gnas pa des/ tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gi lha rnams so// 'odi ni bde ba'i skye gnas gnyi pa'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba myed pa'i bde bas
3b5(mdo): brlan par byed cing / yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de ngag lus nyid la dga' ba myed pa'i bde bas brlan par byas shing yo/
3b6(mdo): su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas nas bde bar reg par gnas so// de dag bde de dag bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/ 'di
3b7(mdo): lha ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde'i rkye gnas gsum pa'o// stong chung ngu 'jig rten gyi khams na gser ga ri chen po bdun stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po gas shing gong dang / gshol mnga' 'dzin stong dang / seng
3b8(mdo): ldeng 'dzin stong dang / bltal na bsdug pa stong dang / rtan 'dzin stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin stong dang / ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gi khams na mtsho chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnyal
3b9(mdo): shing 'dzin gyi mtsho stong dang / gshol yang la 'dzin gi ma gyi nang / seng ldeng can gi stong dang / bltan sdug gi stong dang / tana'i stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin stong dang / rnam par bdud gi mtsho stong ngo // stong chung ngu
4a1(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po sa yang sos stong dang / thig nag stong dang / bsdus 'joms stong dang / ngu 'bor stong dang yul/
4a2(mdo): chab stong dang / rab du chab stong dang / sems can dmyal ba mnar myed pa stong ngo // stong chung ngu 'jig rten gi khams na/ sems can gi gnas su dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yongs su laM lus pa dang cing
4a3(mdo): 'du shes pa dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste myi rnams dang lha kha gcig ste/ 'di ni sems can gi gnas dang po'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad pa la 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste tshangs pa
4a4(mdo): ris gi lha dang po byung ba dag gang yin pa dag ste/ 'di ni sems can gi kA/ sa gnyis pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig la 'a du shes pa dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams te/
4a5(mdo): 'di ni sems can gi gnas gsum pa'o// sems can gzugs yod// pa lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa yod de/ 'di lta ste// dge rgyas gi lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi pa/
4a6(mdo): 'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes myed cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yod de/ thags pa'i 'du/ 'di lta ste/ 'du she sa myed pa'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gi gnas lnga'o//
4a7(mdo): sems can gzugs myed pa rnam pa thams cad du/ gzugs gi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams myed par gyur cing / sna tshogs gi 'du shes rnams yid la myi byed pas nam mkha'
4a8(mdo): mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' yas skye mched bsgrub nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ nam ma kha mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnaMs te/ 'di ni sems can gi nas drug pa'o// sems can
4a9(mdo): gzugs myed pa rnaMb sa cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa yod de/ 'di lta ste/
4b1(mdo): nas shes mtha' yas skye mched bu nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gi gnas bdun pa'o// sems can gzugs myed pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad dun ma shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par/
4b2(mdo): 'das te/ ci yang myed po'i snyam nas/ ci yang myed pa'i skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa dag kyang yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ci yang myed pa'i skye mched du nye bar gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gi gnas brgyad pa'o//
4b3(mdo): sems can gzugs myed pa thams cad du ci yang myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed phyin skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes myed 'du shes skyed kyin
4b4(mdo): skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i kAlha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can ginas dadaku' ba'o// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ myi dge'adab bcul las gi lam dag yod de/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa
4b5(mdo): len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag chub mo dang / tshig kyal pa dang / 'anab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba da rnams so/
4b6(mdo): srog gcod pa shas ches kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed par skye bar 'gyur ro// de ba sa ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang bas ni rab du tsha bad
4b7(mdo): nga// de bas ches shas yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen pos ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung
4b8(mdo): ba dang / de bras ches yang ba ni bsdus 'joms du'o// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bso na thig nag du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang bas ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po
4b9(mdo): yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par lend pa da shas cher kun du bsten cing bsgoms te nang du byas pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig
5a1(mdo): kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang shas cher kun tu bstend cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen por mnar myed par skye bar
5a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang bas na rab du char bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas yang bas na/ de bas ches yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de
5a3(mdo): bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen por ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches ches yang bas ni bsdus 'jom du'o// de bas ches shas
5a4(mdo): chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag du'o// de bas ches sha sa chung dab dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba che na po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gdags pa las
5a5(mdo): tshags gnyis pa'o// sdom ni mkha lding las lam bcu po dang // / myong ba dang ni bkres dang zas/ bdud rtsi phyi bas char pa dang / mu ge bde ba bcu tshan no// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gi la
5a6(mdo): khams na klu'i rigs bzhi stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong shing shal ma li mthon pa la gnas te/ sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang/
5a7(mdo): drod gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong dang // nam mkha' lding sgong las skye ba ni bza ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba 'byind par byed de/ mngal nas skye ba ni myi 'byin/ rdzus te skye ba ni myi 'byin to// de ci'i
5a8(mdo): phyir zhe na/ gal te de len na de len na de nyid bal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding maral nas skye ba bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sko las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las
5a9(mdo): skye ba myi 'byin/ rdzus te skye ba myi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te de len na/ de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding drod gsher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo ra las skyes pa/
5b1(mdo): dang / sangs nas skye ba dang / rlong gagemasas skye bar 'byin par byed de/ rdus te skyes pa myi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gal te de len na de nyid pal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding mus
5b2(mdo): te skye dri bsor ci/ rgyu rlomasas skye dang / sa nas rnam pa dang / rlod gsong las skyes pa dang / rus te skye ba dang / 'byin par byed do// sus ma chen po bskal par gnas shing po 'dzin padag yod de/ ra
5b3(mdo): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dka' gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po rtas rgal dang / klu'i rgyal po btang 'thung dang / klu'i rgyal po ka'i 'a can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung dang / mu'i
5b4(mdo): rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / ku'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la 'dab rnams te// 'di dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding dag gis 'byung
5b5(mdo): bar myi nus pa gang yin pa 'di dag kyi lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed cing / so sor myong bar byed de/ shes shing rab du shes la kun du rab tu shes so// ji skad du// shin tu mthu
5b6(mdo): che ba'i klu dag yod// ma mtha' srung zhing chun gnas pa ste// de dag/ lA m+bi dag dang g.yul 'gyed pas// 'di dag brgya byin gi ni dbu ra yang yin// stobs kyang che zhing dug che klu yin te// shi nang tu
5b7(mdo): drag po'i dgra' thabs cad sna tshogs can// lha min rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pas// de dag brgya byin gi ni dpung yang yin zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o// bar gi sdom ni/ dga' bo nye dga' rtas rgal dang /
5b8(mdo): btang bzung dang ni gzi' can dang // yul 'khor srung dang nag po che// e la'i 'dab ma mtha' ma yin/ stong chung ngu 'jig rten gi khams na// dge' ba bcu'i las ngag yod de// srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
5b9(mdo): byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / thun du smra ba dang / bra sa dang / ngag chub po dang / tshig kyal par spong ba dang / banapa sems myed pa dang / gnod sems myed pa dang / @
6a1(mdo): dag par lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa spong ba dgas cher kun tu bstend cing bsgoms lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas
6a2(mdo): ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'phrul dga' ba rnams so// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches sha yang bas
6a3(mdo): ni mtha' bral ba rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba da/ ma sa ca na bu su na pa'i sems gra tshad ldad nas // de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni myi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye
6a4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len par len dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag phub po dang / tshig kyal pa spong ba dang / banab sems byed pa dang / gnod sems
6a5(mdo): myed pa dang / yang dag par lta ba shas cher kun tu bstend cing bsgom// sa te/ lan mang du byas pas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches
6a6(mdo): shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'phrul dka' ba rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas yang bas ni dka' ldan pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches
6a7(mdo): yang bas na mtha' bral ba rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sum bcu pa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs
6a8(mdo): su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni myi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te myi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skyes na yang / srog gcod pa spong bas ni tshe ring bar 'gyuraro//
6a9(mdo): ma byin par lend pa spong bas ni// longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong bas na chung ma 'gran zla myed sred par 'gyur ro// rdzun du smra ba spong bas ni/ bkur ba mang bar myi 'gyur ro//
6b1(mdo): 'phra ma spong bas ni mdza' bo dang 'bye bar myi 'gyur ro// ngag rtsub pa spong bas ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i skra thos par myi 'gyur ro// tshig kyal pa spong bas ni/ tshig kyal pa spong bas ni/ tshig mnyan par 'gyur ro// brnab
6b2(mdo): sems myed pas ni/ 'dod chags che bar myi 'gyur ro// gnod snyems myed pas ni zhes sdang chas sdang che bar myi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i lta bas ni gti mug che bar myi 'gyur ro// bar sdom ni/ bskur ba myed dang mdza
6b3(mdo): mying byed// de bzhin yid du 'ong ba thob// mnyan pa'i tshig du 'gyur ba ste// yi ge bzhi ni brjod pa yin// sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni// las gang gi rnam par smyind pas mnar myed
6b4(mdo): pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por tshe'i tshad bskul par len pa tha chad yin no// dud 'gror myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang nas/ las gi rnam par smind pas sa srung gi bus srung gi bu nyi
6b5(mdo): dang / rab btan gyis rab brtan nyid thob pa nyid pa chad nya yin no/ yi dgas gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi// nang na ni las ka nams ka nang na gang gi rnam par smin pas ni
6b6(mdo): rgyal po gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyal srid pa kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de tha chad yin no// myi'i skye gnas myo ra bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni// las gang gang gi rnam
6b7(mdo): par smin pas pa la nus pa la nu nyid thob pa de mchog yin no// rgyal chen bzhi pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams gi nang na ni/ las gi rnam par smind pas rgyal po chen po bzhis rgyal srid las dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de
6b8(mdo): mchog yin no// sum bcu rtsa gsum myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smind pas brgya byin gis brgya byin nyid thob par de mchog yin no// mtha' bral myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams gi nang
6b9(mdo): na ni/ las gang gang gi rnam par smind pas rab mthe ba bral nyid thob pa de mchog yin no/ dga' ldan myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams gi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smind pas yongs su dga' ldan nyid thob pa de
7a1(mdo): mchog yan yin no// 'phrul dga'i myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams gi nang nas ni/ las gang gis rnams par smind pas/ rab 'phrul gis rab 'phrul nyid thob pa de mchog yin no// gzhan
7a2(mdo): 'phrul dbang byed myong par 'gyur ro ba'i las rnams gi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smind pas dbang byed kyis dbang byed nyid thob pa de mchog yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la bkres pa dang
7a3(mdo): sgom pa yod bzhin du/ shar ki lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ban yang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu'i pha gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
7a4(mdo): bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul pa dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dpa la yod do// de yan chad la ni bkres pa dang bsgom pa myed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi
7a5(mdo): myi rnams la kha zas 'di lta ste/ 'bras chan dang / zan dang phye// dang / sha dang / khur ba rnams dang / yod pa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba lang spyod pa rnams
7a6(mdo): la yang yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan gi myi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ri sa ra gi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin tu/ sum bcu ma gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
7a7(mdo): bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yod do// de yan chad la ni bkres pa dang skom dang/ myed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi phyi rnams la6/
7a8(mdo): zas 'di lta ste/ 'bras 'chan dang / zan dang / phye dang / sha dang khur pa dmas yod pa bzhin du/ shar ki lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba yang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang ki sgra myi snyan gi myi
7a9(mdo): rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams ni dri za'o// bdud rtsi yang za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum bcu \u0f7f gsum pa rnas
7b1(mdo): dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// de yan chad la ni khams gi zas myed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha/
7b2(mdo): nams kyi bdud rtsi ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab bral ba rnams dang
7b3(mdo): dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams na byed do// de yan cad la yang myed do// ji ltar 'jam bu gling gi myi rnams la bshad pa dang
7b4(mdo): gcing yod pa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nung dgi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sa myi snyan pa rnams la ya dang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha nas la ni myed do// de yan chad la
7b5(mdo): yang skyed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu kring gi myi rnams la char 'bab mas pa dang / char 'bab myi mazhapa sa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang
7b6(mdo): yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris gi lha rnams la ni myed do// de yan chad la yang myed do// ji ltar 'jam bu'i gling gi myi rnams la lo legs pa dang / mu go yod pa bzhin du/
7b7(mdo): shar ni lus pags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba yang spyod pa rnams la dang mong // byang gis gyi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyas chen tshan 'i ris gi pa rnams la ni byed do// de lan chad la yang byed do// ji ltar 'das bu'i
7b8(mdo): ki myi rnams la 'jigs pa dang / bde ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar ki lus 'phags pa dang / nub gi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan pa'i myi rnams la ni myed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha
7b9(mdo): rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang // 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// masasan pa cad/
8a1(mdo): 'jig rten gdags pa las tshig gsum pa'o// sdom ni/ nyo tshong mdog dang kham pa dang / gding ba dang ni gzhag gos dang / yang dang basbed dang tha dang dang / bag ma len pa bcu tsan yin/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi/
8a2(mdo): myo rnams la nor ram 'bru 'am/ gser dang / dngul gis nyo tshong bya ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba lang spyad pa rnams la ni yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan gi myi rnams dang / rgyal
8a3(mdo): chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams ka la myed do// de yan chad la yang myed do// 'di skad bdag / du 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams ni nor dang / 'bru rnams gi nyo tshong byed do// shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams ni/ ras dang bye'u ras nas/
8a4(mdo): kyis so// nub gi ba lang spyod pa rnams ni ba lang dang nor bu rnams kyis so// zhes zer ba yod do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams kyi mdog rag pa dang / dkar po dang / sngo ba sangs dang / mdog skya sngar
8a5(mdo): rnam pa bzhi yod pa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba lang spyod rnams kyang de bzhin no/ byang gi sgra myi snyan gi myi rnams ni mdog gcig ste dkar po'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams
8a6(mdo): kyi mdog ma ni bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams
8a7(mdo): dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ras gi lha rnams ni mdog gcig ste dkar ro// tshangs ris ji lta ba de bzhin du/ tshangs
8a8(mdo): pa'i bdun 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad myed go rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge' chung ba rnams dang / tshad myed dge' ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa
8a9(mdo): rnams dang / sprin myed pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / myi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba sdams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og
8b1(mdo): 'og rkyen gi bang gi lharnams dang kyang de bzhin no// nam ma'a' mamalams skye ched pa dang / nam shes mtha lasas skye mched pa dang / ci yang byed pa'i skyemams ma na na gyu// de ser 'dus su gling gi phyinas
8b2(mdo): gi 'ang ba med du byas pa dang / ched dus byas pa ma yin pa dang / gnal byud khang 'dra ba dang / sa khang rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shang gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nubag pa yang spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no//
8b3(mdo): kyang gis kyi snyan gi gyi rnams kyi 'ang pa ni ched du byas pa ma yin las khang ni med du byas pa dang / rer du byas pa ma yin pa dan no// rgyal chen bzhis pa'i lharnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum bcun gsum pa rnams dang /
8b4(mdo): 'dab bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul pa/ la ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang zhin no// tshangs rim pa rnams shi gzhal byed khang rnams ni/
8b5(mdo): cad du byas pa ma yin pa dag go/ tshangs rim pa rnams ki dzi wA pa bzhin 'og sbyin pa rnams ka bar zhi gzhas myed khang rnams kyang ched dus byas pa yin no// gzugs byed pa rnams la ni 5
8b6(mdo): pa ngag myod do// ji lam 'das bu gling gi phyi rnams la gding 'a bgo ba 'dis 'o/ bal gos dang / rgan 'a ngas dang / ma ras dang / bar ma'i ras dang / ram gos dang / zas dang dang /
8b7(mdo): ko tas pa'i ras dang / mab dru gu la'i gos dang / a pa ran taka'i gos dang / ras dang / ze 'u ras yod pa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi la lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do//
8b8(mdo): byang gi sgra mi snyan gi myi rnams ni dpags bsams shing las byung ba'i gos dag gyon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra myi snyan ki ka myi rnams dpags bsams shing las byung ba gos dag gyon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
8b9(mdo): gi lha rnams dang / sum cu pa gsum pa rnams dang / 'ba' thal pa rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no//
9a1(mdo): ris gi lha rnams ni gos gyon pa bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris gi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bar dag kyang gos gyon pa bzhin du skye'o// byang gi sgra myi snyan gi myi rnams kyi dpags bsams gi gos
9a2(mdo): kyi shing rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// gzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// dpags bsas
9a3(mdo): gi shing las 'byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams te/ dpags bsams gi shi las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pas de la bu skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dag gis
9a4(mdo): sems bskyed ma thag du de la yal ka 'dud par byed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gi dpags bsams kyi shing rnams kyang de bzhin rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar/
9a5(mdo): pa rnams so// dpags bsams shing las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / da kar po rnams te/ dpags bsams shing ra las byung ba'i gos ji lta
9a6(mdo): bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'dang lham/ lha'i bu mo dag gis sems skyed ma thag tu yal ga 'dud par byed de// de'i lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ra lha rnams gi ji ba bzhin du/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
9a7(mdo): ge bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris gi lha rnams la ni/ dpags bsams kau shing las byung ba'i gos byed do// de yan chad la yang myed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la gting ba dang / bko ba lci ba dang /
9a8(mdo): yang ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi bgrang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi myi rnams gi dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i kos la ni/ srang gcig yod do// rgyal
9a9(mdo): chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gi ni srang byed yod do// sum bcul rtsa gsum gi lha rnams gi ni srang gzhi cha gcig go// bab bral ba rnams kyi mi srang gi brgyad cha gcig/ dga' ldan pa rnams gi srang gi bcu' drug gi chag ci
9b1(mdo): 'phrul dga' ba rnams gi ni srang gi sum su ma gnyis kyi cha gcig go// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams ki ni dpags bsams kyi zhing las 'byung ba'i gos ni srang gi drug bcu' rtsa bzhi'i che gcig go// tshangs ris
9b2(mdo): ki lha rnams kyi ni gzhal du byed pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bar gi lha rnams kyi gzhal du byed pa'i gos yin no// nye ler gi gdul gi bzhi bcu rtsam cig ni rdul phra rab yin no//
9b3(mdo): rdutshul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go// rdul phra mo bdun la ni nye zer gi tshul gcig ko/ nyi zer gi rdul bdun la ri bong rdul gcig go// ri bong rdul 'dun la ni lug rdul gcig go// lug rdul gdun la ni glang rdul gcig/
9b4(mdo): glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go// sro ma bdun la ni a ka na ga cigo// a ga na bdun la ni pa tig gcig go// pa tig bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/
9b5(mdo): soram nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni lakhru gang ngo // 'jas gling gi myi rnams la cig ni khru lang de ltar brtses pa'i zhu phyed dang / bzhi pa'o// sha rang gi lus 'phags pa rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub gi bar
9b6(mdo): yang spyod pa rnams ni khru bcu drug pa'o// byang gi sgra kyi snyan pa rnams ni khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kI lA'i rnams ki lus tho za rgyar grags bzhi cha gcig go// sum cu rtsa gsum pa
9b7(mdo): rnams kyi rgyang grags byed do// 'bab bral ba ni rlung grags gi bzhi gsum mo// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyud grakas kyi bzhi cha gcig go// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ni rgyud grags phyed dang gnyis so// tshangs ris kyi
9b8(mdo): rnams gi ni dpag tshad phyed do// tshangs pa 'dun 'dond pa rnams ni dpag tshad gcig go// tshangs pa chen po rnams ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis so// 'od chung ba rnams gi ni dpag tshad gnyis so// tshad myed 'od rnams
9b9(mdo): gon dpag chad pazhi'o// 'od gsal pa rnams kyi ni dpag mang brgyad do// dge 'chung ba rnams gi ni dpag char bcu drug go// chad byed dgel ba rnams ki ni dpag chad sum bcurtsa gnyis so// dge' rgyas
10a1(mdo): nams ki ni dpag chad drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// sprin myed pa rnams kau ni dpag tshad mya nyi shum lnga'o// bsod skyes pa rnams kyi dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ki ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o//
10a2(mdo): 'du shes myed pa'i sems can rnams kyi pa yang de dang 'dra'o// myi che ba'i lha'i lus thob pa rnams ki ni dpag tshad stong ngo // myi gdung ba rnams kyi dpag tshad nyis stong ngo // gya nom snang ba rnams kyi mi dpag tshad bzhi'i stong ngo //
10a3(mdo): shin du mthong ba rnams gi ni dpag sa g+sag pagatud gzhan kyi lan khyo ga rigatog gtse zhe sa la ni bsags pa'i sa myed do// nyi zer rdul gi bzhi'i bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul 'phra rab yin no// rdul 'phra rab bdun la ni nyi zer
10a4(mdo): gi rdul gcig go// rgyas par khru kang gi bar du ste/ 'dzam bu kling gi myi kha cig ni kos khru brgyad pa gyon mo// kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o// shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams kau ni khru nyi shu'o// nub gi
10a5(mdo): ba yang spyod pa rnams ni khru bzhi bcu'o// byang gi sgra myi snyan bgyi myi rnams ni dpags bsams shing las 'byung ba'i gos khru brgya cu/ gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris gi lha rnams kyang lus la ci
10a6(mdo): ran pa'i gos gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myen gi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams dbang po tha dad de// kha cig la ni
10a7(mdo): mo'i dbang po dang / kha cig ni po'i dbang po yod bzhin du shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ban lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa
10a8(mdo): gsum pa dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris gi lha rnams la ni/ mo'i dbang po
10a9(mdo): yang myed do// pho'i dbang po yang myed/ tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la bag ma gtong ba dang / bag ma len pa yod
10b1(mdo): pa bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi phan lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan gyi phyi rnams la ni byed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu ma gsum pa rnas
10b2(mdo): dang / 'bab zlas pa rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris gi lha rnams la bag ma gtong ba yang myed bkram
10b3(mdo): len pa yang byed do yang byed// mangs ris kyi sngarnams pa ji lbu ba bzhin du 'on phyir ki bdu dag kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshigs bzhi pa'o// sdom ni/ grangs dang dus tshigs mtshan mo/
10b4(mdo): dang / pha ma dang ni rje khol dang / nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhen// bcu tshan yongs su brjod pa yin/ ji ltar 'dzam bu k+ki dki mi rnams la shind du grang ba dang / shin tu tsha ba yod pa bzhi
10b5(mdo): nu shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba lang spyod parnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams la ni myed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la yang myed do//
10b6(mdo): de yan chad la yang myed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu sring gi myi rnams la dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dkun dang / dping dang / dbyar yod bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi sa
10b7(mdo): yang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams
10b8(mdo): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris gi lha rnams la dus tshigs myed de/ 'og gyen gi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mye rnams la mtshan mo dang nyin mo
10b9(mdo): yod bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub gi ban lang ba rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhil pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu la rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thang /
11a1(mdo): bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris ki lha rnams la mtshan mo dang / nyin mo yang myed
11a2(mdo): do// tshangs ris pa rnams pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du// 'og myen gi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la pha dang ma yod bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi
11a3(mdo): bini lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan gi myi rnams dang // rgyal chen po bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu'i rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga'
11a4(mdo): ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni pha yang myed ma yang myed/ tshangs ras kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// 'og myin gi bar dag la yang de bzhin no//
11a5(mdo): ji ltar 'dzam bu klong ki myi rnams la jo bo dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shan+da kyi gi lus 'phags pa dang / rkub kyi ba lang myod pa pa rnams la yang / yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan pa'i mya rnams la ni jo bo yang myed bran
11a6(mdo): yang myed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni jo bo dang bran pa yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams ji lta bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa ka sum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams
11a7(mdo): dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni jo bo yang myed bran yang myed do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myin ka bar dag
11a8(mdo): la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu kling ki myi rnams la nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnas pa dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang ki sgra myi snyan kyi myi rnams la ni 'bru ni/
11a9(mdo): yod la nor na myed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la nor ni yod la 'bru mi myed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa
11b1(mdo): dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni nor yang myed 'bru yang myed do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og byin gyi bar dag la ya
11b2(mdo): de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi gyi rnams la pa 'am/ ma 'am/ bu po 'am/ bu mo 'am/ jo bo 'am/ bran nam/ nor ram/ 'bru la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi/
11b3(mdo): ba lang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyen ki myi rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa myed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams ni 'bru ma gtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhend pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha
11b4(mdo): rnams ji ba bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral bu rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbu byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi
11b5(mdo): lha rnams ni co la yang mngon par zhen pa myed do// tshangs ris pa/ rnams ji lta ba bzhin/ tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams da / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang /
11b6(mdo): myed 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba ni sa dang / tshad myed dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / myi che
11b7(mdo): ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shi nad tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og myin gyi rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten dgas pa las tshigs lnga pa'o// // sdom ni/ zla
11b8(mdo): mtshan 'khrig dang zhu rgyu dang / tshe dang nag po chu krung thug/ sa la dzing dang glang po dang / srungs ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myo rnams la/ bud myed zla mtshan can dang / sbrum ma dang /
11b9(mdo): shu btsal ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi banas pa spyod pa rnams pa dang / byang gi sgra gyi nang pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling na
12a1(mdo): kyi rnams kyi khye'u 'am bu mo lo lnga lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lnga 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am pa bar sems can zhus te skye bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lga 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag 'di snyaman
12a2(mdo): 'di mi bdagi bu 'am/ bu me'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam bya/ 'di ni bdag cag gi a 'am/ pha'o snyam du sems so// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni/ lo drug lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no//
12a3(mdo): 'thab bral ba rnams kyi lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi na lo dgu lon pa ci tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnaMs
12a4(mdo): kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams kyi khye'u dang bu mo lo bcu lon pa tsam pa de bzhin du lba 'am/ lha'i bu mo'i zag pa 'am phang par rdzus te skye ba'i sems can 'byung bar 'gyur te// de na lnga 'am lha'i bu mo dag/
12a5(mdo): 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am bu mo snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di bdag gi ma 'am pa'o snyam du sems so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thog ma nyid nas yan lag
12a6(mdo): dang nyin lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing 'chi ba na yang de kho na pon na no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'og myin ka bar dag kyang de bzhin no// gzugs myed pa rnams ni lus kyi gzugs myed
12a7(mdo): ro// de nas ni de dag ni skye bar yang myi mngon/ 'chi ba yang gyi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi gyo rnams kyi tshangs par spyod pa'i chud pa'i chos bsten pa'i ni/ gnyis kyi gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi yu
12a8(mdo): 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba yang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams 'khyud pa tsam gyis kra
12a9(mdo): bzhi par 'gyur ro// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so// 'phrul dka' ba rnams ni bkad pa tsam gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni bltas pa tsam gis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro//
12b1(mdo): tshangs ris pa rnams ni 'dod chags byed do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la zhu chu myi gtsang ba yod pa 'byung ba bzhin du/ shar gyi sum
12b2(mdo): 'phags pa rnams dang / nub gi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa'i phyi rnams la yang de bzhin no// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i snga rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyas chen bzhi pa'i ngos kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum
12b3(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab zil ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi de bzhin no// tshangs ris lha rnams la 'dod chags byed do//
12b4(mdo): ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og byin gi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi bar dri bskalang pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba'i na yod do// dud 'gro ba
12b5(mdo): skye gnas su skye ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi bar gyi bskal/ pa cig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// gyi rnams kyi nyon zhag sum bcu gang yin pa de ni yo dgas rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ste/
12b6(mdo): nyin zhag sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ yi dgas rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi bar ni lnga brgya ste/ bar ma ro ba'ab ni yod do// myil ster rtsin lo khri lnga stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'ja
12b7(mdo): kyi gyo rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma do 'chi ba ni yod do// nub kyi pha lapa spyod kyi myornams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyand myi rnams kyi
12b8(mdo): tshad kyi rab ni lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni myed do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra gyi snyang gi myi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba myed ce na/ de dag la bdag gi bamyed cing yongs su 'dzind pa byed de/ tshe nges shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin
12b9(mdo): bas/ de'i phyir byang gi sgra myi snyan gyi myi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba myed do// 'dzam bu gling gi gyi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang / mar 'grib pa yod do// 'dzam bu kling gi myi rnams res 'aka' ni tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur la/
13a1(mdo): res 'ga' ni tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro// myi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ko// nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/
13a2(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi ltar brtsin lo sa ya phrag dgu yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin
13a3(mdo): zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
13a4(mdo): de myi'i ltar rtsi ne lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyis stong yod do// rnams kyi lo brgya kang yin pa de ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum kyi lA rnam sa kyi nyin zhag kacig go/ nyin cika de sum la zla ba gcig/ zla ba
13a5(mdo): gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum ki lha rnams kyi tshe li/ tshad kyi ra ba ni/ lha'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i lter rtsi na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang / sa ya phrag drug yod
13a6(mdo): do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig ko/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla gcig go/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo/ gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thog nag gi tshe'i tshad kyi
13a7(mdo): rab ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i lo sbyong ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// de mya'i ltar rtsi ma lo bye ba phrag 'bum 'phrag bcu gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang
13a8(mdo): pa de ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba kacig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ra ba ni lha'i lo nyi stong ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni
13a9(mdo): yod do/ de myi ltar rtsi na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po sdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig
13b1(mdo): ste// sems can dmyal ba chen po skus gnom gyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i chang rab ni/ sems cad dmyal pa'i so nyis song ste/ bar ma don ma mi bani yod do// de rtsi'i skam bgyid/ so bye ba phrag gcig dang / bye ba za/
13b2(mdo): 'bum 'bum ste/ bye ba zag nuka khri brgyad stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yid pa de ni dka' sngun kI lha rnams kyi nyon zhag gcig go// nyin zhag sum rgyal tha ba gcig/ zla ba zacu gnyis la lo gcis/
13b3(mdo): ste/ dka' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo lo ni stong ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod // de rtsi'i ltar zin/ lo bye ba phrag lnga cu ma bdud dang / lo sa la zag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal
13b4(mdo): pa chen po bya 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bangal nu ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems ma dmyal ba chen po ru 'bod kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sems na
13b5(mdo): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor / 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i ltar brtsim/ lo bye ba brgyad dang / lo bye ba phrag sa la gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgul 'bum pa ni/
13b6(mdo): khri bzhi stong yod do// gyi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgyad kang yin pa don/ 'phrul dka'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum rgyal tha ba gcig/ zla ba glanyis la lo gcig ste/ 'phrul dga'
13b7(mdo): ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi bar ni l+le'i lo brgyad stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i ltar rtsi ma/ lo bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ru 'bod cen
13b8(mdo): po'i nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cul zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ru 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo brgyad stong ste/ bar ma ro 'chi ba ni yod
13b9(mdo): ro// de myo'i ltung brtsa me/ so bye ba phrag bye ba drug brgyam drug dang bye ba zag sa pa gsum dang / bye ba phrag snga 'bum lnga khri nyis stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya ga pa yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang /
14a1(mdo): byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig go// zla ba bcu gnyis lo gcig ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lA'i lo khri drug
14a2(mdo): stong ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yo dod // de myi'i ltar brtsin/ lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po che ba'i nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag re
14a3(mdo): sum cu la thA ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po che ba'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod
14a4(mdo): do// de myi'i ltar rtsi na/ lo bye ba phrag bye ba lnga brgya dang / lo bye ba phrag bye ba sum cu dang / le bye ba phrag sa ya brgyad dang / bzhi 'bum dang/ lo bye ba phrag khI drug sbyong yod do// bar sdom ni dgu dang /
14a5(mdo): gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / nyis brgya/ dgu brgya rnams ni myo'i grangs kyis lha tsher bshad/ de bzhin gcig dang / bcu gnyis gcig dang brgyad dang drug cu dang /
14a6(mdo): lnga brgya dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i tsher bshad/ tshangs sa gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi ra ba ni bskal pa byed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu
14a7(mdo): tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa byed de/ bar ma dor 'chib ni yod do// tshangs pa 'dun na 'dod kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kau reb ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can
14a8(mdo): dmyal ba chen po mnar myed pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab mi bskal pa gcig ste/ rabar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po rang gi bar ni bskal pa phyed dang gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
14a9(mdo): 'od chung gi lha rnams gi tshe'i chang na gi rab ni bskal pa gnyis ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad myed 'od gi lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad gi rab ni bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
14b1(mdo): 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gi bar ni/ bskal pa brgyad de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad gi rab ni/ bskal pa bcur bcu drug ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba
14b2(mdo): ni yod do// tshad myed dge' ba'i lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad gi bar ni bskal pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge rgyas gi lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi
14b3(mdo): ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sprin myed gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i nang gi rab ni/ skal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad gi bar ni/ skal
14b4(mdo): banyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams gi tshe'i chang gi rab ni/ bskal pa lU brgya ste// bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes myed pa'i
14b5(mdo): sems can lha rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba'o// myi che ba'i lha rnam sa gi tshe'i tshad gi rab ni/ bskal pa ste/ bar ma dora'achi ba ni yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad ni/
14b6(mdo): bskal pa nyis stong ste// bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad rab ni/ skal pa bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad
14b7(mdo): ki rab ni/ bskal pa brgyad stong ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams gi tshe'i tshad gi rab ni/ bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nam mkha' mtha'
14b8(mdo): yas skye mched gi lha rnams gi tshe'i chad gi rab ni/ bskal pa nyi khri ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ge lko ni tshad ki rab ni// bskal pa bzhi khri ste/ bar ma dor
14b9(mdo): 'chi ba ni yod do// ci yang myed pa'i skye mched gi lha rnams gi tshe'i tshwa ni rab ni/ bskal pa drug khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i/
15a1(mdo): tshad gi rab ni/ bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na ri nags po
15a2(mdo): gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na yang ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs shes zhes bya ba yod do//
15a3(mdo): ri'i rgyal po gangs gi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po spos ki dang ldang zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po spos ki rang ldang nas dpag tshad bcu'i chu rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba yod de/ ma dros pa zhes bya'o//
15a4(mdo): mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// 'khor yug ni dpag tshad nyis pargya yod ya / dbyib legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chubasi
15a5(mdo): zhing / chu sbrang rtsi lta bu gang la/ me tog ud pa la dang / padam dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos kun tu khyebs pa/ ra 'dug go// de'i nang na krung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang ka
15a6(mdo): dang / sin d+hu dang / sid ta dang / pag shu dang / 'di ltar 'bab po// gang ga ni shar phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'babs ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klu
15a7(mdo): lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// sin du ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ 'di ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu
15a8(mdo): lho phyogs gi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// pag shu ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen pa chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang / lhan cig tu nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen
15a9(mdo): por 'gro'o// si ta ni byang phyogs ni seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba las g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs gi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// ji skad
15b1(mdo): du byang phyogs kha gu 'gyur ba'i chu tsho mdzod// gzhan ya / de ni mtsho chen chu zhes bya// ba dang rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod// nu klung kang ka sin pa pag shu dang / si ta ba' rlabs dbu ba'i 'phreng bam
15b2(mdo): can/ chus gang khyad par 'phags pa bzhi 'bab ste/ phyogs bzhi dag du kun tu rnam par 'bab/ gang bshar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba ste na du ga bya na na rgya 'a
15b3(mdo): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ mchog du bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste/ re re zhing yang lnga brgya khyer nas ni/ chu'i rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro zhem 'byung ba lta bu'o// ri spos gi rad ldang de'i byang phyogs su dpas
15b4(mdo): tshad nyi shu ga ser gri brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos shes bya ba ma dwede/ nur dpag tshad snga bcul/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ 'khor yug tu dpag tshad ni rdza da sha ga dbyibs legs shing
15b5(mdo): lha na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de'i nang gis gno song de/ de la nang gis nig me sgribs legs shing bstan du ga la yangs pa gser gi bye ma bdal cing / tsam ngan gi chus cha
15b6(mdo): chag btab ste/ der yid du 'ong ba zhing ngam gsegs dang / ci yang rung ba dag ltung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'bor ro// de'i khor ra khor yug tu gser gi brag tu
15b7(mdo): skyibs brgyang stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing ldan sdug la mdzes pa ste/ de dag gi nad kyis zhig rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing bltan bsdug pa mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdas
15b8(mdo): tsan dan gi chus chag chag pa ste/ de dag tu yang yid du phyi 'ong ba'i gseg ma dang / gyo mo gang ci yang rung ba dag ltung na/ de myi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam snying
15b9(mdo): tu dpag cad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag chad byed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gi bye ma bdal bcing / can dan gi chus chag chag gdab pa yod de/ der yang yid du mi/
16a1(mdo): 'ong ba'i zhing dang gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de myi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor// brag skyibs lha ma yin gi ngos de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na shing sa/
16a2(mdo): la'i rgyal po chen po rab tu brtan zhes bya ba'i sa la'i 'breng ba rim pa bdun gyis skor ba yod do// sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan de'i rtsa ba ni mngom bcu bzhi mthur du zug go// sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i rtsa ba ni mngom bcu
16a3(mdo): gsum thur du zug go// gnyis pa yi ni bcu gnyis so// gsum pa'i ni bcu gcig go// bzhi pa'i ni bcu'o// lnga pa'i ni dgu'o// drug pa'i ni brgyad do// sa la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bdun
16a4(mdo): zug go// sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan de'i yal ka dang lo ma dang / yal ka rnams gang yin pa de ni sa lI 'phreng ba dang po la zug go// sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i yal ga dang lo ma gang yin pa de ni gnyis
16a5(mdo): pa'o// na kyi zin mchen ni gnyis pa'o// gnyis pa ka/ pa yin pa de ni gsum pa la'o// gsum pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzhi pa la'o// bzhi pa gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa ka
16a6(mdo): yin pa de ni drug pa la'o// drug pa gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o// sa la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i yal ka dang lo ma dang / yal ka gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// de dag nang gi sa
16a7(mdo): la gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug tha la mdzes pa kagaser gi bye ma bdal cing can dan gi chus chag chag btab ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam gseg ma dang / gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de myi
16a8(mdo): ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs pa shing bltar na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong
16a9(mdo): ba'i shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung dag ltung na de mi ma yin pa rnams gis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan gi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na rdzing dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba
16b1(mdo): chung dpag ched lnga bcu/ kha con du dpag tshad lnga bcu ste/ mtha' skor du dpag chad brgya yod pa dbyibs legs shing bltan bsrug pa mengs pa chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad/
16b2(mdo): ma dang / ku mu ta dang / rdzad ma kar pos khebs pa yod de/ rdzing bu ral kis 'bab ki nang gi pad ma'i lo ma rnams che zhing mchog du che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang yog pa tsam mo/ pad ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing
16b3(mdo): mchog du che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mda'atshas mo// pad ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog pu ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing na'i phang lo tsam mo// pad+ma pa'i rtsa bu rnams che zhing mchog tu me ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes
16b4(mdo): bu chen po'i brlamam mo// ro mangs zhing mchog du mang te/ 'di de lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na dang 'o ma 'dzag go// rdzing dal gis 'bab gi kho ra yuka ni rdzi buM
16b5(mdo): brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing lha na bsdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu bran sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de dag gis nang gi pad ma'i lo ma rnams kyang che zhing mchog
16b6(mdo): tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang yog tsam mo// pad ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mnga' tsam mo/ pad ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta /
16b7(mdo): phar lo tsam mo// pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog du mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad/
16b8(mdo): na yang 'o ma 'dzag go// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ kha con du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na bsdug la mdzes pa gser gi bye ma bdal cing tsan ran gi chus chag chag btab pa yod
16b9(mdo): te/ der yang yid tu mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de myi ma yin pa rnams gi rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gi glang po che'i rgyal po
17a1(mdo): g.yul ngor spyad par rab brtan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug la/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i
17a2(mdo): 'gro bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na bsdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing dbus srog chags lham bu chu gsher gi mdog ltar dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gi srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/
17a3(mdo): zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ khor yug du dpag tshad bdun yod do// de'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na bsdug la mdzes pa
17a4(mdo): me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing yan lag bcu na shin da tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo' bo yang dbyibs legs shing lta na bsdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing dbus
17a5(mdo): gi srog chags lham bu chu gsher gi mdog ltar dmar la mche ba dru/ g.yod pa stag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan de 'khor dang bcas pa dgun zla bzhi ni/ brag bya skyibs lA ma yin gi ros/
17a6(mdo): gi nang na gnas shing 'dug go/ dpyid zla ba bzhi ni shing sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan gi nang ka nas shing 'dug go// gang gi tshe glang po tshe'i rgyal po rab brtan brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gi ros gi nang na gnas shin
17a7(mdo): 'dug pa de'i tshe na glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab btan srung ba dang / sba ba dang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir brag bya skyibs brgyad stong dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi
17a8(mdo): che glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gi nang nas/ shing sa la'i rgyal po rab gtan gi drung du 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' ni za mal ba'i tshul gis 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha
17a9(mdo): 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad gi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid gi mgo bo 'am/ bya la khar
17b1(mdo): zhon te sil bstan dang / pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gape ma glang po che'i rgyal po rab btan zhing sa la'i rgyal po rab btan gi rlung na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i mAn/ glang po che brgyad stong po de dag
17b2(mdo): kyang 'di smra ste/ glang po che rgyal po rab btan bsrung ba dang / smra ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir shing sa la'i 'phreng ba'i rim pa bdun po dag gin nang sa nang du ltas shing 'khod de/ gong ma la'i 'dren
17b3(mdo): pa dang po'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang bu lus te 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du blta'o// gsum pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o//
17b4(mdo): bzhi pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// bdun pa'i nang na
17b5(mdo): kang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang na cu lU ste 'khod do// gang ni che glang po che'i rgyal po rab tun shings la'i rgyal po rab brtan nas/ rdzing dag gis 'bab par 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' ni
17b6(mdo): tha mal ba'i tshul gis 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas glang po che de dag thams
17b7(mdo): cang gi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid gi 'go' bo'am/ byal khar zhon ta sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan brtan rdzing ral gis
17b8(mdo): 'bab pa'i nang du zhugs nas che zhing dka' gal dga' mgur spyod pa de'i cha/ glang po che brgyad stong po de dag 'dis ste/ glang po che rab brtan de srung ba dang / swa ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing dag gis
17b9(mdo): 'bab gi mthal 'khor khor yug nas bskor ste/ nang du bltas shing khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab btan rdzing dal kis 'bab gi napan rtse zhing dga' mgur spyad nas phyir 'byung ba de'i tshe/ de'i nang na glang
18a1(mdo): tshe dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de rdzing dal gis 'bab gi nang du zhugs padas pad ma'i a ba rnams blangs te/ shi nad tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal nas/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan la 'bul
18a2(mdo): lo// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gis zos shing 'thungs te/ 'drangs par gyur pa de'i tshe glang po che gzhan brgyad stong po de dag kyang rdzing bu brgyad stong dag gi nang du rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga'
18a3(mdo): la dga' mgur spyod do// pad ma'i rtsa ba dga' blangs nas shi nad tu dkrugs shing rab tu bshal te/ za'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab brtan gi mthu ni de tsam mo// sem
18a4(mdo): can thams cad ni bsrung ba dang bcasas shing / srung ba dang / skyob/ sbed pa dang / myi bral te sems can gang dbang chung bar grags pa shing bsod nams chung la gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong
18a5(mdo): phrag mang po gcig kyis bsrungs bsrungs te/ sdom ni ba lang ngam/ yug brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dpal gcig gis sru nga ba de bzhin du sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing bsod
18a6(mdo): nams chung la gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gis srung ngo // sems can gang da bar che bar grags shing bsod nams che la gzi' brjid che ba de
18a7(mdo): dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig srung ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa/
18a8(mdo): brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig srung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang che bar grags shing bsod nams che la gzi' brjid che de dag la/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag
18a9(mdo): gyis gcig srung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ ji ste sems can thams cad bsrungs ma dang bcas shing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred pa dang / mi bral na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba dag yod par 'gyur / smras pa/
18b1(mdo): srungs ma mabu chung ba zhig yin na de zil kis dag mnan nas 'tshe ba dag yod do// srungs ma bag myed la cing bag myed pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de bag myed pa'i rgyu las kyang 'tshe ba dag yod do// srungs ma nyis
18b2(mdo): snyoms nas kyang / zil gis mnan nas 'tshe bar byed do// myi rnams chos ma yin pa spyod cing mi rigs pa spyod pa zhig yin na/ chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang / myi rigs pa spyod pa de dag la yang 'tshe ba dag yod de/
18b3(mdo): gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mi srung rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta ste/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / gsum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong
18b4(mdo): ga'i gnas rnams dang / zong 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i la gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / bsod byed gi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod
18b5(mdo): de/ zla ba phyed gi tshes brgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi ka/ yog zho shas 'tsho ba danams lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams
18b6(mdo): dang / me tog 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zor 'gram ba'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas kanams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / bsod byed gi gnas rnams
18b7(mdo): na/ su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thas cad la nyul te/ gald te de dag gis skyen par tshor ba na/ de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// gald te de dag gis skyend par ma tshor na ni/ de dag gnas dmar ba
18b8(mdo): la 'god do// zla ba phyed gi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dag bu rnams lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo' dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me rtog gi 'phreng
18b9(mdo): ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zob 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / bsod byed gi gnas na/ su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de dag gos skyen
19a1(mdo): par tshor na ni/ de dag gnas mthon po la 'khod do// gal te de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni/ de dag gnas dma' ba la dgod do// za ba phyed gi tshes bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po
19a2(mdo): de dag nyid lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / bong 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong
19a3(mdo): ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed gi gnas na/ su zhig 'dug ces/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de dag gis skyen par tshor ba ni/ de dag gnas 'on
19a4(mdo): po la dgod do// gal te de dag gis sbyin par ma tshor na ri/ de daHgnas dpa' ba la 'god do// bcom ldan 'das gis kyang de skad du dge' srong dag za ba phyed gi tshes brgyad la ni/ rgyal po chen po 'azhi
19a5(mdo): po dag gi/ g.yog zho zhes 'tsho ba rnams ci mi dang myi ma yin pa'i// 'jig rten na// mar 'dzind pa dang / par 'dzind pa dang / dge' sbyong du 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang /
19a6(mdo): rigs ki rtse bo la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la/ kha na ma tho ba rnams gis 'jigs par lta ba dang /
19a7(mdo): sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims la yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam/ zhes 'jig rtend 'di thams cad la nyul lo// za ba
19a8(mdo): byeng gi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang / myi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzind pa dang / par 'dzind pa dang / dge' sbyong du 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzin
19a9(mdo): pa dang / rigs kyi rtso ba la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa la byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma la kha na ma po pa rnams kyis/ 'jigs par/
19b1(mdo): lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing / bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag pa mang ngam zhes/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad la
19b2(mdo): rgyal lo// za ba byed gi ches bco lnga la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag nyid ci myi dang / phyi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzind pa dang / par 'dzind pa dang / dge' sbyong du 'dzind pa dang / zam
19b3(mdo): ber 'dzind pa dang / rigs gi tso bo la'i mo byed pa dang / dor byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang / tshe bye ma la kha nam po ba rnams kyis/ 'jigs par
19b4(mdo): ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dag/ gso skyong dag byed pa nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams
19b5(mdo): cad la nyul lo// gal te myi dang phyi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na ma / nad pa dang 'i sa pa ma du myi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer gyi/ 'dzidad pa dang / rigs gi rtse bo la ri mo myi byed pa dang / don ma
19b6(mdo): byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa myi byed pa dang / bsod nams kyi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la khan ma zo ba rnams kyis 'jigs pa mi lwa ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing / bsod nams ngag gi phyin
19b7(mdo): ba dang / gso'i spyod la nye bar myi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag ma pad ni/ rgyal po chen po dgazhi po rnams/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lnga'i 'dun sa chos babang du 'dus
19b8(mdo): shing 'khod pa nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag zhes par gyis shig/ myi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten namar mi 'dzind pa dang / par mi 'dzind pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer mi 'ja
19b9(mdo): pa dang / rigs gi bu tso bo la ri mo myi byed pa dang / don myi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa myi byed pa dang / bsod nams myi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma yo ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin
20a1(mdo): pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso' spyong la nye bar myi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ myi 'dug pa dag yang ngo zhes bsnyed do// de dag las los nas/
20a2(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid la rangs shing mi bku gyur nas/ yid ma rangs pa nyid kyang phyir thos par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar gyi dang gyi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar gyi 'dzind pa dang
20a3(mdo): par mi 'dzind pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzinang pa dang / bram zer gyi 'dzin pa dang / rigs gi tso ba la ri mo myi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rig pa la myi byed pa dang / bsod nams myi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la Sha
20a4(mdo): namamo ba rnams gis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag myi sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag myi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la/ nye bar myi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi
20a5(mdo): 'dug pa mang ba ni/ mi rnams kyis chos bzang po ma yin no// rkye nang du bab ma yin no// legs pa ma yin no// dge ba ma yin no// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par
20a6(mdo): 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes bzlas so// g.yang te mi dang mi dang ma yin pa'i 'jigs rten na/ mar 'dzind pa dang / par 'dzi dang pa dang / dge sbyong du
20a7(mdo): 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang / rigs gi bu gtso bo la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis
20a8(mdo): 'jigs par blta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams/ sum
20a9(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du 'dus shing / 'bod pa'i nang du so nas/ 'di srid du grogs po dag shes par gis shig/ phyi dang phyi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang
20b1(mdo): par 'dzind pa dang / dge' sbyong du 'dzind pa dang / rigs gi tso bo la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma po pa rnams
20b2(mdo): kyis 'jigs par blta' ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams byed pa dang / gso' sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba nas 'dug pa dag mang po zhes bsnyad na ni/ de dag las
20b3(mdo): thos nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid rangs shing mgu bar gyur nas/ yid rengs par nyid kyang zlos par byed/ kye ma'i grogs po dag 'di ltar myi dang myi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzind pa dang
20b4(mdo): par 'dzind pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang / rigs gi gtso bo la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi
20b5(mdo): ma la nye bar tho rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa
20b6(mdo): dag mang ba ni/ myi rnams gi chos bzang ro// rkyen du bab po// legs so// dgel ba'o// de ltar na lha rnams gi tshogs ni mngon par 'phyel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi chogs
20b7(mdo): ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro// zhes zlos so// de nas lha rnams gi dbang po brgya byin gis lha'i 'khor rab du dga' la bde zhing bde ba skyes par rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dir ni phra phyed/
20b8(mdo): ches brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bcwa lnga dang / cho 'phrul gi ni zla byed la'ang / gso sbyong la yan lag brgyad pa la// shinang du mnyam par bzhag gnas byed 'dir/ ra ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur// dge
20b9(mdo): slong dag lha rnams gi dbang po brgya byin gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni bla byed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bcwa lnga dang / cho 'phrul gi ni zla byed pa'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin du mnya
21a1(mdo): gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur/ zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de nyid ni nyes par smras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yin no// nges par bstod pa yin gi/ legs
21a2(mdo): par bstod par ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin ki/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhes sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug
21a3(mdo): dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / rgas pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol zhing / sdug
21a4(mdo): bsngal las yongs su grol lo// zhes nga smra'o// de lta bas na des kang 'di skad du// 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bcu lngas// chos 'phrul gi ni zla byed la'ang / gso slong
21a5(mdo): yan lag brgyad pa la// shi na tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// ra ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras/ pa/ nyes par smras pa yin gi/ legs par smras pa ma yin
21a6(mdo): no// nyes par bstod pa yin ki/ legs par bstod pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin ki/ legs par brjod pa ni ma yin no// dge slong dag dge slong kang dgra bcom pa yin zhing / zag pa zad pa
21a7(mdo): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba des gang 'di skad du// 'dir zla phyed
21a8(mdo): tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bcu lnga dang / cho 'phrul ki ni Ta byed la 'ang/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin pa tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir / bci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa
21a9(mdo): 'di smras pa na/ legs par smras pa yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par bstod pa yin te/ nyes par bstod pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ni ma yin no//
21b1(mdo): dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhes sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags/
21b2(mdo): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ga las yongs su gros zhing / sdug bsngal las yongs su grol ba'o zhes pa smras ste/ de lta bas na des ni gang 'di skad du 'dir mi zla byed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin
21b3(mdo): bzhi bco lnga dang // mo'i thul ki ni za byed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shi nang du mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// ngaci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras na/ legs /
21b4(mdo): smras pa yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par bste/ dad pa yin te/ nyes par bstod pa ma yin no// legs par bya rjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so//
21b5(mdo): 'dzam bu gling gi khor ra khor yug na 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam dpagatshad gcig pu gser gi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chus/ pus mo nub tsam du yongs su khyab po/ gang gi tshe 'khor los
21b6(mdo): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'jig chen du/ 'byung ba ji )/ ma po ni po dpag cad gnyis gi bar mu rdugs shing med par 'gyur // 'khor los bskur ba'i rgyal po gang nas sring du 'gro ba de ni/
21b7(mdo): los sgyur ba'i lam yin no// bcom ldan 'das gis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon gi 'byung ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i chan kra ses rin po chen brtag par 'dod pas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi che glang po rin
21b8(mdo): po me la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la bug pa 'dir bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du 'ong nas khye'u sus ki bya ba byed do// dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po chen brtag par 'dod pa/
21b9(mdo): nyi ma shar ba'i dus gi che/ rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug gi nyid gaskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus gi bya ba myed do zhes gsungs so// spyi'i sdom ni/ ri dang skye bo'i
22a1(mdo): gnas dag dang / nam mkha' lding dang nyo 'tshong dang / grang ba dag ni lnga par byas/ dus tshigs kyang ni tha ma yin/ 'jigs rten gdags pa las tshigs drug pa'o// /
