22a2(mdo): sdom ni/ srungs ma lha'i grong khyer srang dang rnam rgyal byed/ chos bzangs sgyu ma'i lam dang 'ongs dang skyed mos tshal/ sa gzhi dang ni yongs su rdo dang glang chen rnams// lha ma yin rnams ki de dang 'dra ba yin/ lha'i
22a3(mdo): grong khyer dang / lha ma yin gi grong khyer gi bar du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i srungs ma rnam pa lnga bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ mun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng ba thogs
22a4(mdo): dang lha rnams dang / rtag du myos kyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po mazhi rnams so// gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod par 'dod par
22a5(mdo): gyurd pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i cho ga/ sa dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go gyon no// go cha rnams
22a6(mdo): pa bzhi gyon pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// go cha rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
22a7(mdo): byas pa dang be dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnams la 'di lta ste/ ral gi dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams lend to// mtshon cha rnam bzhi
22a8(mdo): ral gyi dang mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mnga' gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gi grong khyer nas byung ngo // lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi cho gas yan lag
22a9(mdo): bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs gi go cha bkos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa byas dang / bai dur+ya las byas
22b1(mdo): pa dang / shel las byas pa bgos nas/ mtshon charnam bzhi ral ki dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mnga' gzhu rnams blangs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'ged pa'i phyir/ lha ma yin gi grong
22b2(mdo): khyer nas byung ba de dag chun gnas pa'i klu rnams gi mthong / mthong nas nas mun gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang
22b3(mdo): dpung du chung gi tshogs dang / rnams gis go cha bkos nas/ go cha rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai rur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas rnams bgos nas/ mtshon chanam
22b4(mdo): bzhi ral gi dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhun dmas blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// der gal te klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams lam/
22b5(mdo): par gyur da pa na ni/ klu rnams gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing dz+riM ma par bya ste/ bzlog cing chub ston par byas nas/ lA ma yi/ na mi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams
22b6(mdo): rgyas te/ klu rnams 'phan na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po
22b7(mdo): nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab gi bang rim dang po lag na yol ko thogs ki lha rnams gang na 'khor pa ngu zhing 'gro'o/ de nas lag na yol go thogs kyi sa lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / srungs ma gnyis cig/
22b8(mdo): du bsdongs nas/ lha ma yin dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// der gal te srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srungs ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par
22b9(mdo): byas nas/ lha ma yin gi mong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lA ma yin rnams rgyal te srungs ma gnyis pa ma na ni/ sum bcum gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams kyi phub cing lam par byas te/
23a1(mdo): bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gi bang rim dang po nas khang rim gnyis pa 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams gang na 'khor bar nu zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'phreng thogs kau lha rnams dang / lag
23a2(mdo): nayol go bags kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gsum po rnams gcig du bsdoms nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// de ltar gal te srungs ma gsum po
23a3(mdo): nams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ srungs ma gsum po dag kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing / 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas lha ma yin gi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
23a4(mdo): gal de lha ma yin rgyal na de/ srungs ma gsum po rnams pam na / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ka spangs ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ bozlogs cing
23a5(mdo): rgyabastan par byas nas/ ro'i rgyal po rire rab gi ba rim gnyis pa nas/ bang rim gsum tag myos pa'i lha rnams gang na 'khod par rgyu zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag du myos pa'i lha rnams pa
23a6(mdo): 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / laka na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa kra rnams dang / srungs ma bzhi po rnams gcig du bsdongs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu
23a7(mdo): g.yul 'byed do// der gal te srungs ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ srungs ma bzhi po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stonang par byas nas
23a8(mdo): lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma bzhi pa rnams pham ma ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams kyis phub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par
23b1(mdo): byas nas/ r-i'i rgyal po ri rab gi bar rim gsum pa nas/ bad rim thozhi po'i rgyal po bzhi rnams gang na 'khod par chu zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag du myos pa'i lha rnams dang
23b2(mdo): phreng bogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol ko thogs pol lha rnams dang / mun gnas po'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma lnga po rnams gcig tu bsdongs nas nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig du g.yul 'byed
23b3(mdo): der gal te srungs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham no na~M/ srungs ma lnga po dag rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ lha ma yin gi grong
23b4(mdo): khyen du 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs lnga po rnams lam na ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyidaspangs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par
23b5(mdo): byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas/ ri'i rgyal po ra rab rgya/ bang rim bzhi pa nas/ steng gi gzhi sum bcu rtsa gsum pan/ lha rnams gang na 'khod pa nu zhi pa 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po
23b6(mdo): chen po chen po bzhi lha rnams gau dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas// lhan rnams gi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shaM ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin
23b7(mdo): rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gi steng gi gzhing chu ste mchis pa mkhyend par mdzod cig/ ko'u shi ka ra ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/
23b8(mdo): gis rgyal po chen po bzhi pa rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang sungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams tsa kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog
23b9(mdo): cing rgyab stonong par byas nas/ ra'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng ga gan nus ste/ 'ongs pa zhes par byas gis// grags po dag dang ltar gang gi dus la bab pa sems shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byir/
24a1(mdo): byan gis/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab du brtan pa la bsam so// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi bsam pa rtogs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs
24a2(mdo): dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskums pa bzhin du/ glang po'i rgyal po rab du brtan la/ 'jam gr-ing nas myi snang bar 'gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi/
24a3(mdo): nang du song / song nas 'go sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa mngon par sprul 'go re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun rdzing bu re re la pad ma bdun bdun pad ma re re la sdong bu bdun
24a4(mdo): bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun lho'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun g.yog mo re re la saul snyan bdun mngon par sprul te// 'go bo de dag thams cad kau nang ni khyad par
24a5(mdo): du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i 'go bo lhag ma rnams la na~M/ nye dbang po/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon nog ma na kha'i sum cu
24a6(mdo): rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams zhon na/ de shin tu mgyogs te/ dper na 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam/ chags pa'i rlung ste/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro zhe 'am
24a7(mdo): phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa myed do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i grong khyer du gi phyogs kyi sgo nas byung ste/ skyed mos tshal gtsub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon
24a8(mdo): par 'du byed pa de btang ste/ 'di lta ste/ lhal ma lho'i rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthub gang yang rung ba dang 'dra ba bdag nyid mngon par sprul to// sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams dang lhan cig du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan
24a9(mdo): lnga dag 'byor da cing ldan par gyur ra te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang kau 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ji tsam du sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lha skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la
24b1(mdo): dgul dku' smad pa de tsam du lus kyang chub par 'gyur la sems kyang chug par gyur te/ de dag lus kartsub pa dang / sems nub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par gyur nas/ rab
24b2(mdo): ki rtogs yin lag bzhi pa/ 'od skar ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang // rta'i tshogs dang / kong rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/
24b3(mdo): glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung du chung gi tshogs rnams dgis ko cha nam bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du s+ya las
24b4(mdo): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bgos so// ko cha nam pa'i gser las byas dang / dngul las byas pas dang / be dumya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon nas
24b5(mdo): ni 'dis ste/ ras ka dang / bdud dang / 'phang mdu dang / mda' gsurnams grangs so// mtshan mnam tshan ral ki dang / mdung dang / 'phang mad+mang dang / mngalag tu
24b6(mdo): rnams grangs nas/ g+hu ma yin rnams dang / lhan / nu g.yul 'gyed de/ ji ge snga ma yin rnams rgyal skyenams pa ma na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub tsa
24b7(mdo): pham par byas ste/ bzlog cing rgyab stonang par byas nas/ shing ka khyang phyogs su lho'i grong khyer du ga na bar de phyir ldog go/ 'ond kyang lha ma yin rnaMs na kyi phye bzhin du snyegs par bya na na~M/ der lha rnams
24b8(mdo): 'di snyam du sems so// 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las na yang / lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir log ste/ lA ma
24b9(mdo): ma yin rnams dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pa ba na ni lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyi lha rnams bub cing pham par byas
25a1(mdo): thog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ shib ta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer du ga pan par phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du steg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'dis
25a2(mdo): du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin snyegs par byas nas/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang
25a3(mdo): lhan cig du g.yul 'ged do// gal te lha ma yin 'bashig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na na~M/ lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas ste/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas na gros coM D+ho'i grong khyer
25a4(mdo): grus nas/ sgo rnams pacad de lta nas sA la smra ma sbyin na sa sa kyi rmugs kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gas cher gnas mo// 'ond kyang la ma yin nams
25a5(mdo): kyis der myi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar ma yin ni/ lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i/ sems kyis shas ches gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni
25a6(mdo): der mya jo bo snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ gal te lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na na~M/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par
25a7(mdo): byas nas/ shing rta'i lho phyogs su lha ma yin kaM grong khyer kang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'o nad kyang lha rnams lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du stegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems
25a8(mdo): te/ 'di ltar lha 'di bdag cag gi phyi bzhin stegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'ged par 'dod do// snyam du sems nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang ldan cig du g.yul
25a9(mdo): 'byed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ shing rta lho/
25b1(mdo): phyogs su lta/ mas yin gi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gau bya bzhin stegs par byed mni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag
25b2(mdo): cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par byed 'dod snyam shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang ldan gcig du g.yul 'gyed do// gald te yan kasu
25b3(mdo): du lha rnams 'ba' gang rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/
25b4(mdo): yan ka grong khyer du zhugs nas skob cad de/ lha ma yin rnams la sulba gnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der ts+tshi
25b5(mdo): gzhon du lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin kaM grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing smag pa dang ldan pa'i sems/ kyis shas cher khams mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni rer mya rdzin
25b6(mdo): snyam du mthong ba 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ska da du dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed du zhugs pa na/ lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pas na
25b7(mdo): ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams grub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog ci bsond par byas nas/ shing / byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gapan par phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin nams lha rnams kyi bzhin
25b8(mdo): snyegs par byed pa na ni/ den lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/
25b9(mdo): rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pa ma na ni lha ma yin rnams bkyis lha rnams thub cing pham par byas
26a1(mdo): ste/ bzlog cing rgyab stonang par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lho'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du stegs par byed na na~M/ der
26a2(mdo): rnams 'ad snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'od dag bdag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs par las na yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas phyir ldog re/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan
26a3(mdo): gcig du g.yul 'gyed do// dge slong dag de lha ma yin rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na na~M/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stonang par byas nas
26a4(mdo): lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis myi tshugs kyang 'dzi gus shing skrag pa dang / ldan po'i sems kyis shas cher kan so
26a5(mdo): 'o nar kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams/ 'di ltar stan/ n-i lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / lnga na po'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis
26a6(mdo): ni der mi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das pa'i dus na/ lha dang lha ma yin 'das pa'i du gsuM la du zhugs nas/ lha rnams rgyal te lha ma yin rnams pham na ni
26a7(mdo): lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cang rgyab stonang par byas nas/ shing rta lce phyogs su lha ma yin gi grong khyer kang na bar phyir log go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams
26a8(mdo): go phyi bzhin snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas
26a9(mdo): lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang ldan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pa ma na na~M/ lha rnams gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par/
26b1(mdo): byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ shi ba lho phyogs su lA ya yi nog grong khyer gangan pa der byer ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin kau phyi bzhin du stegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams/
26b2(mdo): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams
26b3(mdo): dang ldan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ gal te lan gsum du smra rnams 'ba' shing rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam man/ lha rnams gis lA ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond pa
26b4(mdo): byas te/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad de lha ma yin la lha rnams kyis myi tshugs kyang / 'jigs cing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i
26b5(mdo): sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der myi rdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni/ lha ma yin gi grong khyer na 'dug kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa
26b6(mdo): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der myi rdzi'o// snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur gyur to// ji skad du/
26b7(mdo): gang che lha dang lha myin lhan cig du/ gnyi ga 'dus shing g.yul ni 'gyed pa lan// / shing ti ba'i gnyis pa mtshungs pa myed/ lha'i shing rta pa'i mchog yin no// zhes byung ba lta bu'o// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi kazhi
26b8(mdo): na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis grong khyer bltan sdug ces bya ba na/ sa mas nas sa mtha' sbyor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing bltan sdug la mdzes pa bzhi yod de/
26b9(mdo): gser gi rabs skor te/ ra ba sa 'phang du ni dpag chad byed dang gsum yod do// ra ba de beg rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod do// gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / byi du rgya las byas pa dang / shes
27a1(mdo): las byas pa rnams so// kyem du 'phab ba'i mdal yab dang / bsti 'pharnam pa zhi yod de/ gsemasas byas pa dang / dngus sas byas pa dang / bye du malas
27a2(mdo): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa na so// de'i nang gis sa bzhi dbyings legs shing bldan sdug la mdzes pa/ bkra zhing zhin tu bkru ba tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bkru ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na
27a3(mdo): shing bal gi 'dab 'am/ ras bal gi 'da' ma bzhin te/ rkang pa banan pa na ni nims shes byed/ rkang pa btegs na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos/ pus mo nub pa'i tsam du yongs su kheb
27a4(mdo): te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar rnam sa ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs kyis/ lha'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen
27a5(mdo): snga / me tog rnying pa dag ni 'dor ba byed/ me tog gsar rnams/ ni legs par 'grems te/ shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// lha'i grong khyer de na sgo dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/ sgo re ra la/ yang
27a6(mdo): 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du ni dpag tshad phyed dang ka nyis gnyis yod de/ sgo re re la yang skam ma'i gzugs su phya sa pa rnam bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul gas
27a7(mdo): byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// zla ba kham pa lta bur yongs su grub pa dang / ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang / me long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas
27a8(mdo): pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yod do// sgo re rer yang gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dang / bskyab
27a9(mdo): pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir srungs ma go cha bkos shing / mtshon cha tshogs par thogs pa lnga brgya bkod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang sring du gnyas dpag tshad gnyis stong lnga brgya yod
27b1(mdo): 5/ zhed du dpag cad bcu gnyis yod par dbyims legs pa stan mug la mdzes pa gser gi phyis 'das kyi / can da kyi rgyas jug bad+hA bsod de/ srung de 'am gsas gsod na/ rdzing gse sa rgyam pa du/
27b2(mdo): dngul las byas pa dang / bye dU mya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha ku rnam bzhis brtsigs pa'i rdzing dag yod de/ rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/
27b3(mdo): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du rtsa las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa pa dgu rnam bzhi brtsig go/ rdzing bu de dag lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa
27b4(mdo): rang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam/ bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gi lan kan ki rten ma da gnyal nan dang / shar ba'i dngul las byas so// dngul ga ni
27b5(mdo): gser las byas so// bye du r+ya'i shel las byas so// shes ki lan kan gi rten ma rang / gnyal nar dang / shar pa ni bai dUr+ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing rta na sdug la mdzes
27b6(mdo): rdzing bu re dag kyang chub sil zhing chu sbrang rtsi ltar bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma ka ra po yongasu khyebs ste/ de dag na chu las skyes pa 'am bya sA
27b7(mdo): tshogs gang snyan pa dang / skad yid 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bskur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te/ rdzing de dag gis nyen kor na/ me tog shing ljon pa dang /
27b8(mdo): 'bras bu shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog bong bzhin du gyu rang pa ni dper na me tog gi 'phreng rgyung ngam/ me tog 'phreng chung ki
27b9(mdo): slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba le gu la brgyas pa dang / me tog kai na rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen
28a1(mdo): pa dang / 'dod dgu bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyand pa 'byin no// re dag gi nyen kor na/ dpags bsam kyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang
28a2(mdo): dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ gzhag kos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpags bsam shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste
28a3(mdo): sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rgyan sna tshogs dang / lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// lha'o/
28a4(mdo): lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag du / de lta bu re dag kaM lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo cha s+yA da sna tshogs pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsuM
28a5(mdo): pa dang / khar dza dang / skra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu dang rnams kyis ji lta bu'o// 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag ru/ de lta bu de dag gi lag
28a6(mdo): du'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag yod do// yang rtog pa rnams dang khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dngakhyim rnams dang / khang bzangs
28a7(mdo): rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltar mo blta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud med gi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo yang pos bste rang pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg
28a8(mdo): rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa spogs pa dang / dri'i tshogs kas legs par bskos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / ldan pa dag kyang yod de/ de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i rnams 'khor dang bcas
28a9(mdo): pa rtse zhing / rga la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gi dbus na lha rnams gau dbang po brgya byin gi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba/ chur
28b1(mdo): dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa dbyibs legs pa shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed rang lngas
28b2(mdo): gyen du 'phags so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed/ de'i rmang rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa las/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas
28b3(mdo): pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang pa'angs rnam par rgyal ba de'i them pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las
28b4(mdo): byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byad kyi ka ba rnam par rgyal byed gzhi btsugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa byas pa dang / gdul las
28b5(mdo): byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams te/ gser gi ka ba ni ka rte na dang / ka zhu dang / bre phul dang gdung rnams dngul las byas so// bye du s+ya ni shel /
28b6(mdo): byas so/ shel ka ri ka rtend pa dang / ka zhu dang / pre phul dang / gdung bye dur+ya las byas so// khang bzangs rnam parargyal byed de'i byam rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/
28b7(mdo): lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du rtsa las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la byam stobs dang ldan pa bzhi las byas pa
28b8(mdo): dag yod de/ 'di sa ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye rur+ya las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams so// khab ba zangs rnam par rnam par rgyal byed la sem sbas rnam
28b9(mdo): pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ bem sbas de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pa gu rnams pa bzhis
29a1(mdo): brtsegs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du mya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun
29a2(mdo): nas bskor te// gser kaM lan kan gau rten ma dang / gnyal na na dang / shar ba naM dngul las byas so// dngul ki ni ka ser las byas so// bye du r+ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gi rten ma dang / gnyal nan
29a3(mdo): dang / shar ba ni bye du r+ya las byas so// bar sdom ni/ rmang rten them pa ka ba dang / phyam rten dang ni stobs ldan phyam// 'khor sa dang naM spang leb khapa// yas phubs dag ni tha ma yin// khang bzangs
29a4(mdo): rnam par rgyal byed la ba gam brgya yod de/ ba ga ma re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bdun bdun yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re re la yang gnas khang bdun bdun/ gnas kha ba re re la/ lga'e/
29a5(mdo): bu mo bdun bdun lnga'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la yang sil snyan bdun bdun yod do// khang bzangs rnam par Sha nga rgyal byed kai napa na rdzing bu byas pa/ yod
29a6(mdo): de rdzing bu de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ kha tshon du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyes brgya yod do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang
29a7(mdo): 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhis brtsegs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor
29a8(mdo): te lan kan rnam bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / par ma
29a9(mdo): dkar pos yongs su khyebs la chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa 'byin pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can skad snyan par 'byind to//
29b1(mdo): rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'o shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub ste/ me tog bor bzhin du gyur pa da ni/ dper/
29b2(mdo): na me tog 'phreng brgyad dam/ me tog 'phreng brgyad gi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba be ku la brgyas pa dang / me tog kau rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las bsres pa'i bya sna tshogs skad
29b3(mdo): snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen ring ba dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byi nang to// dpags bsam kau shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste sngon po dang / ser po/
29b4(mdo): dag/ dmar po dang / dkar po dag ko// gzhag kos nasarab ban thA/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po rang dkar po dag go/ dpags bsam gi shing las byub ba'i gos dag
29b5(mdo): rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag ko// rgyan sna tshogs dang / laka rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i sha
29b6(mdo): ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi khang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar dza dpa/ skra snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing ljonang pa dag yod de/
29b7(mdo): lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag du de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do/
29b8(mdo): yang tog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khar rnams bud med ga tshogs kyis mdzes par byas
29b9(mdo): shipa lha'i bu mo mang po bstenang pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs gis legs par bskos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa yod de/
30a1(mdo): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa che zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// rang kyi las kau 'bras bu 'anyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer ki shar lho mtshams na/ sum
30a2(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi// lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs shes bya ba yod do/ chur dpag tshad sum brgya rgyar yang dpag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ lha'i grong khyer dpag tshad
30a3(mdo): phyed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i bdun sa chos bzangs kyi gzhi dang / yang tog dang dka' ba dang / spyi 'dus gi gdung dang / yang tog gi rtse gzhi dang / phya ma gzungs dang / phya ma dgu po thams cad shel
30a4(mdo): las byas pa dbyibs legs shing blta na bsdug la mdzes pa daste/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / rungul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam
30a5(mdo): pa bzhis kun nas bskor nga to// de la sgo dang ya phubs dang / g+ha na dang / yang rtog gi rtse bzhi dang / lu na dang / phyam dgu po yod do// phya ma dgu po re re la yang ka ba bcu drug bcu dru
30a6(mdo): kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod do// de'i dbus na bye du r+ya las byas pa'i ka ba zur brgyad pa gsal zhing 'phan myed la/ mtshan dang ldan pa bzhi ka yod de/ skra'i rtse mo tsam
30a7(mdo): gyis khang pa brtsegs pa spyi 'dus gi rten la myi reg go// de'i 'og na lngal dbang po brgya byin gi gser gyi khri bzang po dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do// der sum bcu
30a8(mdo): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas/ lha rnams dang myi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de/ yongs su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam kha tshon du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod
30a9(mdo): pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa \u0f7f/ gser gi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ dngos g.yas g.yon na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon
30b1(mdo): pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs pa yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog thod bzhin gyur da pan ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng brgyad dam/ me tog 'breng brgyad gi slob ma mkhas pa/
30b2(mdo): me tog gi 'phreng ba be ku la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs dang / snyanang pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod
30b3(mdo): dgun bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyand pa 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rim kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag kyang thabs dang / kha tshon du dpag tshad gcig tsam yod de/ pa ru
30b4(mdo): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / byeHrdza las byas pa dang / ge la las byas pa rngas pa bzhis brtsigs la/ mu bsil chu snang rtsi sa bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang /
30b5(mdo): pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos yongs su khyebs/ 5/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skang mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbrum
30b6(mdo): ba'i gzugs can 'arnams skad snyand par 'byid to// 'obs re dag na chu dka' ba dang / rgyu mo kung dang / mu sna tshogs byas pa dag yod do// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/
30b7(mdo): chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing / dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// 'obs de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bul shing ljon pa dang sna tshogs pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs
30b8(mdo): su grub pa ste/ me tog zor bzhin du gyur na ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng brgyad dam/ me tog 'phreng brgyud gi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba the ku la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs
30b9(mdo): par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byor to// de ma su/
31a1(mdo): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas par rtse zhing / dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// rang gi las gi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer ki shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sum
31a2(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal/ shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' bskor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/
31a3(mdo): dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gi dra bas pas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la gcog gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya
31a4(mdo): las byas pa dang / shel yas byas pa rnam pa bzhi yo do/ rkyen du 'phang ba dang / bur du 'phang ba mda' yab dang / bsti khang rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang // dngul
31a5(mdo): las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnamaso// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes las bkra shing shin tu bkra ba mtshon sna brgya
31a6(mdo): brtsa gcig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shi nad tu 'jam pa ni dper na/ shaMng bal gi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gi 'dab ma bzhin te/ dkar pa bzhag na ni nem zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par nas
31a7(mdo): byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar rnams ni legs par 'grems te// dzaM skad du lha rnams bsod
31a8(mdo): nams dbang gi rten gyis nA/ shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rlung chen ldang // me tog rting pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems// shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// skyed mo
31a9(mdo): tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na/ rdzing bu dpag tshad lnga bcu kha tshon du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad gnyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
31b1(mdo): byug pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pa mgu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang /
31b2(mdo): she la las byas pa rnams pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chubasil ba dang / chu skang rtsis zhus kang ni me tog/ ung ba la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma ma kAr pos yongs su khyabs
31b3(mdo): nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skung bstan pa dang / skad yang du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyan pa dang / 'dod dmur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byin du to// rdzing bu de'i nyen ko mar me tog gi shing sngon
31b4(mdo): pa dang / 'bras bu'i zhing ljon pa legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa dag yod / me tog zod bzhin gyur pa rI/ dper ra me tog 'phreng brgyad dam/ me tog 'breng rgyud
31b5(mdo): gi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba the gu la brgyus pa/ dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ ska/ ma las skyes pa dpya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong
31b6(mdo): ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur skyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byinang to// dpags bsams kyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po rang
31b7(mdo): dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpag bsams gi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste
31b8(mdo): sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna chos
31b9(mdo): 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar dza dang / sgra snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la
32a1(mdo): bu de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sA chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang /
32a2(mdo): bsil khang rnams dang / phung po lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams rang bud byed gi tshogs gris gadzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pas bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / bekra rdob pa dag gi sgra sgrogs pa dang /
32a3(mdo): brisna tshogs gis galegs par gaskos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa yod de/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa brtse zhing dka' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las ki 'bras bu nyam
32a4(mdo): su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer ki shar lho mtshams na/ sum bcu rtsagasum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs shes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad sum brgya rgyar yang dpag tshad sum brgya/
32a5(mdo): mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ lha'i grong khyer gyi las da bag tshad phyed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs gi gzhi dang / yang tog dang dga' ba dang / spyi 'dus kyi
32a6(mdo): gdung dang / yang tog gi rtse gzhi dang / phyam gzungs dang / phyam dgu pa thams cad shel byas pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan gser las byas pa byas dang / dngul las byas pa dang /
32a7(mdo): bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor to// de la sgo dang ya phubs dang / g+ha na dang / yang me tog kyi rtse bzhi dang / lu na dang / phyam dku dgu po yod de/ phyam dgu po re
32a8(mdo): re la/ yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug kyis kun nas brte nad to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod do// de'i dbus na bye duts+tsha las byas pa'i bka' ba zur brkyang pa gsal zhing 'phan myed la/ mtshan dang ldan pa bzhi ka
32a9(mdo): yod de/ skra'i rtse mo tsam kis khang pa brtsegs pa'i spyi 'dus gau te nad la myi reg go// re'i 'og du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gser gi khri bzang po dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bsham
32b1(mdo): pa yod do// der sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas/ lha rnams dang myi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de/ yongs su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam kha tshor
32b2(mdo): du dag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing bltan bsdug la mdzes pa/ gser gi bye ma bdal cing can dan gyis chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ dengs g.yas g.yom ma/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang/
32b3(mdo): 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pas rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog song bzhin du gyu rang pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng brgyang ngam/ me tog 'phreng brgyad gi slob
32b4(mdo): ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba the ku la brgyus pa dang / me tog ki rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad
32b5(mdo): yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byor to// lha'i grong khyera'obs bdun rim gyis kun nas bskor ba te/ 'obs de dag kyang
32b6(mdo): thabs dang / kha tshon du dpag tshad gcig tsam yod pa/ pha ku gseram las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye rulas byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams pa bzhis brtsigs pa
32b7(mdo): chu gsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs la/ mun skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skang /
32b8(mdo): mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyand pa 'byind to// 'obs de dag na chu dkar ba dang / rgyu mo kung dang gru sna tshogs das byas pa dag yod do// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
32b9(mdo): chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// 'obs de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang tshogs pa sna tshogs pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su
33a1(mdo): 5/ grub pa ste/ me tog bor bzhin du mya rang ma ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng brgyud dam/ kye tog 'phreng brgyang gi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba phe ku la brgyas pa dag/ me tog ki na rgyan legs par
33a2(mdo): byas bzhin ste/ skam las skyes mi bya/ sna tshogs dang sang snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skang mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyanang pa 'byin de/ de na sum bcu
33a3(mdo): gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas par rtse zhing / dgal la dga' mgur spyod do// rang gi las gi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gi shar phyogs dpa ga nyi shu ma sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i wA
33a4(mdo): rnams kI bskyed mos chal/ shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de dachu dpag tshad gnyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyur yang dpag tshadanyis brgya lnga bcu/ mab skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa// dbyin
33a5(mdo): legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gi dra bas kun nas pa ra te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ rab de la gcog gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang /
33a6(mdo): bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// rkyen du 'phang ba dang / bur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / bsti khang rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
33a7(mdo): byas pa dang / bye ru m+b+ha las byas pa dang / spel rnams so// de'i nang gi sa ka'i dbyibs legs zhing bsan sdug la mdzes pa/ bkra zhi ba'i nang tu bkra pa mtshon sa brgyan gcig gis bkra pa skye/ 'a
33a8(mdo): nibu zhin du'ajam bu ni dper nA/ shing bral gi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab pa bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ bteg ma ni bar zhes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba ma tho pus mo nub cam/
33a9(mdo): chu yongs su khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar rnams ni legs par 'grem te// ji skad du lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rten gyi nang na// shing rta sna tshogs can na nu
33b1(mdo): chen lnga pa/ me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// skyed mos tshal grib rta sna tshogs can gi nang na/ rdzing bu dpag tshad lnga bcu / kha tshon
33b2(mdo): du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye ru r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis
33b3(mdo): brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin/ them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa gu rnam bzhis
33b4(mdo): brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i lA kA gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pra dam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chu bsil ba'i dang chu
33b5(mdo): sbrad rtsi lta bus gang zhing / me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos yongs su khyebs la chu na/ ke sa skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa 'byin pa dang / skad yid
33b6(mdo): du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgu rtswa'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa legs par skyes shing
33b7(mdo): dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa dag yod de/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng brgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng brgyud gi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba the gu la brgyus pa dang /
33b8(mdo): me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyand pa 'byind to// dpags
33b9(mdo): bsams gi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag ko/ gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon pa dang / ser po dang / dkar po dag go//
34a1(mdo): dpags dasams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhis skye/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dag go// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang/ rkang rgyan dang / rgyan sna
34a2(mdo): ba dang / myi snang ba dang rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi par dang / gling bu dang / paM bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i
34a3(mdo): shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bu 'dod pa' sems bskyed ma thag tu de ltar bu de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btud
34a4(mdo): ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang sa 'dzi/ ltar mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams su bud myed gi
34a5(mdo): cho gas gis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten da pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdeb pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgo gas pa dang / tri sna tshogs gis legs par bsgos pa dang / bza/
34a6(mdo): ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de// de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i lam chur
34a7(mdo): dpag tshad nyi shu/ kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa/ dbyibs legs pa blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser ki bye ma bdal cing can dan gi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na/
34a8(mdo): me tog gi/ ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa dag yod de/ me tog thod bzhin du gyurd pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam me
34a9(mdo): tog 'phreng brgyud gi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba phe gu brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba
34b1(mdo): rang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dasur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpags bsams kyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
34b2(mdo): dag go// gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpags bsams ki shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
34b3(mdo): dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol ma'i cha byad sna tshogs pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar dza dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs
34b4(mdo): lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong
34b5(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// lam de na gzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di la/ ste/ glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / ki brta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa yod de/ lha 'am
34b6(mdo): 'i bu mo rnams bzhon pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag du de lta bu'i gzhon pa la zhon par gyur te/ skyed yos tshal zhing ta sna tshogs can du rong nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dka' mgur spyod de
34b7(mdo): rang gi las gi las bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can ma/ rdzing bu sna tshogs shes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa sA
34b8(mdo): cho gas dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me togs sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / kos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la gang gi tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos
34b9(mdo): tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dgal la dga' mgur spyod la/ rang gi las gi 'bras bu ni nyams su myong ba de'i tshe yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras
35a1(mdo): bu nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gi phying shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal de shing rta sna tshogs can gi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu dang / sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs shes
35a2(mdo): bya ga yod de/ chur dpag chad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor bu yang dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lan kar gser las ka byas
35a3(mdo): ba dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dU r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gi lam kar gi chen ma dang / gnya nan dang / shar ba ni dngul las byas so/
35a4(mdo): dngul ni gser las byas so// bye du kyan shel las byas/ shes gi rten ma dang gnyal nan dang / bye du lnga las byas so// de'i nang gi sa gzhig dbyibs shing bltan smug la mdzes pa/ bkra
35a5(mdo): zhing shi nab tu bkra ba/ mtshon sna brgyartsa gcig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam shing shi nang du 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bas ki 'dasab 'am/ ras bal gi 'dab ma pa bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag
35a6(mdo): na ni nebs shes byed la/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la/ mye tog man ra ra ba mos pus nub tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlud kyis mthus me tog snying pa rnams ni 'dor/
35a7(mdo): me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du/ lha rnams las gi dbang gis rkyen kyis na/ sa gzhi sna tshogs cam na rlung chen ldang/ me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog sar pa
35a8(mdo): rnams ni legs par 'grems/ shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// de srid du dpag chad nyi shu/ kha tshor du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gi bye ma bdal pa cing
35a9(mdo): can gang dgi chus cag chag btab pa yod de/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i zhing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la
35b1(mdo): yongs su grub pa dag yod de/ me tog zong bzhin du gyur pa ni dperan/ me tog 'breng brgyud gi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba ze gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi na rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin
35b2(mdo): te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad pa 'byi nang to// dpags bsams gi shing ljon pa dang /
35b3(mdo): sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams
35b4(mdo): gi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po pa dang / ser po dang / mar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'iHbyang sna tshogs bi bang dang / gling bu dang / byi bar rgyud ka su
35b5(mdo): ba dang / khar dza dang / sgra snyand rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan snga tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang / rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba
35b6(mdo): shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag du de lta bu de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'a gyur ro// lam de na gzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/
35b7(mdo): glang po che'i gzhon pa dang / rta'i gzhon pa dang / shing rta'i gzhon pa dang / khyogs gi gzhon pa dag yod de/ lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo rnams gzhon pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i gzhon
35b8(mdo): pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la gzhon nas sa zhig sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing cing bder gnas par mngon par dga' bar byed do// de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gi
35b9(mdo): lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu'i rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag char stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing bal
36a1(mdo): blta na sdug la mdzes pa ka ser gi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ dra ba'i dbang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par mdzod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/
36a2(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na skyed mos tshal gyi mos nub 'gyur tshal ga zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal nas dzing bu rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang /
36a3(mdo): 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams rtsub 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub bar par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos chal rtsub 'gyur tshal du dga' la
36a4(mdo): dka' makur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul la mos par gyur pas ma de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gi ming rtsub par 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o// skyed
36a5(mdo): mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal lho phyogs dpag tshar nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur/ zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu
36a6(mdo): mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa zhig bzang po sna tshogs can ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal/ 'dres pa'i tshal
36a7(mdo): zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu rgyar dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag cad stong yod la/ gser gi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad cig
36a8(mdo): yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyis myi nga 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos 'tshal 'dres pa'i
36a9(mdo): tshal nas/ rdzing 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams
36b1(mdo): 'dres pa yod la/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsu pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na/ rtse zhing dkal la dka' mgur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang tshol par 'dres te/ shi nang tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' makun
36b2(mdo): gyod de/ rang gi las gi 'bras su nyams bu nyong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyis mying 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos 'dres pa tshal gyis nub phyogs dpags tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po des
36b3(mdo): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag chang nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyam yang dpag chad mnyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor bu dpag chad stong yod des zhig bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// lwa'i
36b4(mdo): grong khyer gyi byang phyogs su dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpar
36b5(mdo): tshad stong yod la/ gser gi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra/ ba'i 'phang du dpag tshar gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji ska da bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/
36b6(mdo): ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mying dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ sa pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na/ rdzing bu dka' ba zhes bya ba'i dang / shing rnams dang lo ma rnams dang / me tog
36b7(mdo): rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dka' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos cha la/ dka' ba'i
36b8(mdo): tshal du rtse zhing dka' mgur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' zhing yid bde bar gyu rang nas/ rtse zhing dka' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las gi 'bras bus nyams su myong bas na/ de'i
36b9(mdo): phyir bskyed mos tshal gyis myang dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o// bskyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyis byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa zhig bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya
37a1(mdo): lnga bcu rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshar stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas pa/
37a2(mdo): brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer ki byang shar ki phye tshams ma/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol zhes bya ba yod de/ yongs su sa brtol gi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bur du zug go/
37a3(mdo): 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do// 6yal ka'i phyir gyes pa ni/ dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// yongs su sa brtol ki yal ka lnga yod do// yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu dud // yal ka
37a4(mdo): gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu bdud do// yal ka gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu rung // yal ba zhi ba ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu ru ro// yal ga steng
37a5(mdo): ma ni dpag tshad bcur ste ra gi nam mkha' la khyab par 'dug go/ yongs 'du sa rtol ki srid du dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do// spobs su yang dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du
37a6(mdo): dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do// yongs su sa brtol gi dri rdzi phyog sa su ni dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'i dang ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgya nur ni 'od
37a7(mdo): dang kha dog gis lam me/ ldan me lhang rer 'dug go// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ki shing yongs su sa brtol ba 'di lo ma ser las na/ de li su n+yas su pa'i garnams kye la somasus brtol 'di lo ma gsemalas na/ da
37a8(mdo): ring po myi thos par 'dab ma lhag par 'gyur ste nas/ kun tu dag zhing rab tu dkA bas kan pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus btol gi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe/ suM
37a9(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ 'di ni ring po myi thogs par sbal dmyig 'thon par 'gyur ro snyam na/ kun tu dga' bas gnas pa de gang yin pa
37b1(mdo): de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod la// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'bus brtol sbal dmyig zon pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di
37b2(mdo): sbal dmyig 'bon pa las na/ da ring po myi thogs par sbal dmyig bye bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas kun tu dka' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum
37b3(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i shing yongs 'dus brtol sA la myig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu su gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sAl dmyig bye bas las ni/ de ni ring po mi thogs par mi thogs kha 'bu
37b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yol la skabs kyang yod so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'dus brtol gi me tog
37b5(mdo): kha 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyim yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na da ring po mi thogs par mye tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro// snyam
37b6(mdo): nas kun tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod 'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam sa gi shing yongs su sa brtol gi me tog kha bye'o// de'i tshe su
37b7(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/ da ring po myi thogs par mye tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas
37b8(mdo): gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ki shing yongs su sa brtol gi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pas na/ yod 'du sa brtol gi me
37b9(mdo): tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dang ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me/ lhan
38a1(mdo): ne lhan res 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyas 'di ska da du/ dge' slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gi shing yongs 'dus brtol gi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga thur du zug go// 'phang du
38a2(mdo): ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ga dang / lo ma dang / mdab ma rnams kyis dpag chad lnga bcur khyab po// dge' slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gi shing yongs su sa brtol gi lo ma
38a3(mdo): ser ba dang / de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus btol 'di la lo ma ser ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab du dag/
38a4(mdo): pas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge' slob dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs su sa brtol ki 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha la
38a5(mdo): rnams kye ma yongs 'dus btol 'di 'dab ma lhag pa las na/ da ring po mi thogs par sbal myig 'thon par 'gyur ro// snyam nas kun dga' zhing rab tu dka' bas gnas pa gang yin pa
38a6(mdo): de'i dus kyang yod do// dge' slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal gi myig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus rtol
38a7(mdo): 'di sbal dmyig 'bon pa las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal dmyig 'bye bar gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dka' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge' slong dag sum
38a8(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol sAl dmyig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sAl myig bye ba las na/ da ni ring po myi thogs
38a9(mdo): par mye tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab du dka' bas gnas pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong rag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shing yongs 'dus brtol me tog kha 'bus
38b1(mdo): pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis yongs 'bus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pas las na/ da ring po myi thogs par me tog kha bye bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas kun dga' zhing rab tu dgal bas/
38b2(mdo): de'i tshe gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge' sbyong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gi me tog la 'bye ba ma/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma/ yo
38b3(mdo): 'dus brtol 'di me tog la bye ba las na/ ra ni ring po mi logs par me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dgala'i b.rab du dga' bas gnas pas gang yin de'i dus kyang yon
38b4(mdo): ro// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs su sa brtol gi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas
38b5(mdo): pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // ji phyog/ sa ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcu rangang ldang ngo // dang ka tshad brgya nur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me lhan de ljang des
38b6(mdo): 'dug go// shing yongs 'dus brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'o ka ma// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar tha bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor da cing ldan par gyur te
38b7(mdo): rtse zhing dag la la dga' la dga' dkur spyod de/ rang gi las gi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams kyi zhing song 'dus brtol gi ma mu ni de tsam mo// zhes
38b8(mdo): gsungs so// bar gi sdom ni/ dang por lo ma ser ba dang / de nus 'dab ma lcags sbal dmyig 'thon// sbrul myig bye dang me tog 'bul/ mye tog kha bye thams cad rgyas// shing yongs 'du sra brtol
38b9(mdo): gi nang na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gi sor mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/ chu re dpag tshad lA Tu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang /
39a1(mdo): dang bka rdo rje bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bkra zhing shi na tu bkra ba/ mtshon sA lnga brgya rtsa gcig gyis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shi nad du 'jam ste/ dper na/
39a2(mdo): shing bal gi 'dal wa gi she 'i rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na par ces byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi ser
39a3(mdo): seng ge'i khri bzang po/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / khri bshams pa yod do// de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor da cing ldan par gyur
39a4(mdo): te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las gi 'bra sa bu nyams su myong ngo // ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb gi kho ra lo yug na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'i
39a5(mdo): tsho gas yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog zod bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog 'phreng brgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng brgyud gi slob
39a6(mdo): gi ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba be gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba
39a7(mdo): dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur bsgyur ba dang gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// de'i nyen kor dpags bsams gi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / gser po dang /
39a8(mdo): dmar po dang / dkar po dag ko// gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dag dang / dkar po dag go// dpags bsams gi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa ste
39a9(mdo): sdor po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol mo'i che byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ bi yang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar dza dang / spa snyan pa mam
39b1(mdo): 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs/ lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji ltar bur 'dod pa'i
39b2(mdo): sems bskyed ma thag du de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud brtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba de dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim
39b3(mdo): rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams dang / khyer du 'dug pa rnams dang / so so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyud ma rnams dang / pud
39b4(mdo): myed gi tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bstend pa dang / sil snyan rnams dang / pheg rdeb pa dag gi snyan sgrogs pa dag/ dri sna tshogs kis legs par bskos pa dang /
39b5(mdo): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan de/ de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa 'i lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dkal la rA ka' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las ki 'bras bu nyams su myong /
39b6(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsuM pa'i lha rnams gi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du sa pas srung gi pu zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na stug la mdzes pa yod do// me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar
39b7(mdo): thal kar du 'dug la/ yan lag bdun leg par gnas pa ste/ de'i 'go bo dbyibs legs shing blta' na stug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srong chags lha bu ka sher+ra ki mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug
39b8(mdo): yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ dbang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// glang po che'i rgyal pos
39b9(mdo): srung gi bu'i khor glang po che brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na stug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing yan lag bdun shi nad tu legs par
40a1(mdo): gnas pa ste/ de dag gi 'go dang dbyibs legs shing blta' na stug la mdzes te/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa ste/ gang gi tshe sum bcu
40a2(mdo): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal gi tshal gi sar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs gis pus mgo sum bcu rtsa gartsi mngon par sprul te/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun
40a3(mdo): bdun/ rdzing bu re re la par ma bdun bdun/ par ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun
40a4(mdo): mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi napan/ khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhon no// mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye dbang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis po rnaMs
40a5(mdo): zhon no// glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i// lha rnams zhon no// de shin du mgyogs te dper na 'ji// ga pa'i rlung ngam 'chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha 'am
40a6(mdo): lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhe 'am phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa myed do// de nas glang po che sa srungs gi bus sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so sor grong khyer gi sgo/
40a7(mdo): nas 'don no/ bton nas so sor bskyed mos tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang ba nas/ 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lA'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra/
40a8(mdo): bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ lha'i 'dod pa lnga dag 'byor da cing ldan par 'gyurab te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal
40a9(mdo): srid gi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gi dbang po zags bzangs ri sa lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang
40b1(mdo): 'khor grong khyer blta na sdug la mdzes pa dzaM lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi pho brang 'khor lnga grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ni/ de zhin du/ lha ma yin gi dbar/
40b2(mdo): pa zag bzangs ris gi khang bzangs kyang bdams can zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bdun sa chos bzangs shes bya ba ji la ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gi bdun sa yang nor bzangs
40b3(mdo): shes bya'o// sum bcum gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang / nub 'gyur tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / dgal ba'i tshal ji lta ba de bzhin cu/ lha ma yin
40b4(mdo): rnams gi sbed mos tshal gzhi 'dis ste/ kun tu dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' ba'i kun dag/ ra ba rnams yin no// sum bcum gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis
40b5(mdo): gzhi pa'ang po 'di la ste/ sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba ji la ba de bzhin su// lha ma yin/ rnams kyis ga'i bzang po bzhi pa yang kun tu dga' ma dang
40b6(mdo): rab tu dga' ma dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba ma rnams so// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsi tA ba Ta la zhes
40b7(mdo): bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyi ar ma rig sa bu rdo leb ji lta ba bzhin du/ lA ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gi rdo le ba ces bya'o// sum bcu ma gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po
40b8(mdo): skyed mos tshal du spyad pas sa srungs ki bu ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa yang ti se'i grangs rtsegs shes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
40b9(mdo): glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ror myang par rab brtan ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lA ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ror spyad pa yang bzod par dkal ba zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsuM pa'i lha rnams kyi
41a1(mdo): ta'i rgyal po sprin gi shugs shes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag 'gul zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor
41a2(mdo): dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams gi grong khyer yang 'khor dang ldan pa yin no// lha ma yin rnams kyi lha yin gi rgyal srid kyang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ rgyas par
41a3(mdo): brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshigs bdun pa'o// / sdom ni// phyed dang drug dang thar cig mthal// bung dang gang dang 'bri dang / rnyog pa dang ni slu ba dang / phyogs dang
41a4(mdo): shar phyogs 'du byed pa// zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro/ ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ dpag tshad phyed dang drugadang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyar ki cha tsag gis 'dzam bu gling
41a5(mdo): 'dor te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad gi phyed bco brgyar cha gcig khyad par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba
41a6(mdo): na/ dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco' brgyad cha gcig gi rgya mtsho chen por 'dor re// 'dzam bu gling dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad gi bco rgyang gi tsha cig khyab par byed do// zla ba
41a7(mdo): drug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ nyin mo yang cig re re labring zhing mtshan la zar cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug du nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na
41a8(mdo): mtshan ma las thar cig re re 'bri zhing nyin ma las zar cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug du nyi ma lce phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam pu glaing gyi mtha mur du dor ro// zla ba drug du nyi ma byang phyogs/
41a9(mdo): su 'gro ba pa ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba ra 'dzam bu gling gi dbus ring zhig gis 'dor ro// ci'i phyir rgun mtshan ring ba la nyin mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ba
41b1(mdo): me/ 'dzam bu ming gi mkha' myur bu 'dor pas/ de'i phyis na ma tshan mo ring la nyin mo zung ngo // ci'i phyir dpyid dang dbyur nyin mo ring la ma tshan mo zung men/ smras pa/ zla ba drug cu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/
41b2(mdo): byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus ring zhig gis 'dor bas de'i phyir dpyid dang dbyar nyin mo rang la nub mo zung ngo // ci'i phyir dkun grangs par gyur da ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs
41b3(mdo): su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba ra/ dpag chad byed ni khrinas nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung ba rnams rgya mtsho chen por zab pas gling rnams su blang bar gyur te/ de'i phyir kun mang ngo // ci'i phyir dpyid dang dbyar dro bar gyus
41b4(mdo): ce na/ spras pa/ zla ba drug nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad ka ni khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba'i rnams gli rnams su bab pas gling rnams su dro bar gyur te/ de'i phyir na dpyid
41b5(mdo): dang dbyar dro'o// de'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo ches bcu drug/ man cad 'ong bri zhing kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang / chu zheng bri/ zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma rang ni nye bar 'gro ste/ nye bar 'gro/
41b6(mdo): ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las de'i grib ma sbar babs te/ des 'i dkyil 'khor khyebs pashing de'i dkyil 'khor log par gyur te/ phyi snang bas de'i phyir na/ bla'i ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gi
41b7(mdo): ngo che sa bcu drug pan cad 'od bri zhing / kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang / chu zher bri'o// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gi ro gnam stong la mkhyi cad du myi sdang zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams
41b8(mdo): cad gis nye bar 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad gis nye bar 'gro ba de/ rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib ma slar bab pas/ de'i dkyil 'khor khyebs shing des de'i dkyil khor yog par gyur pa te/ myi snang bas
41b9(mdo): de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gi po/ gnam stong la thams cad kyi thams cad du myi snang ngo // ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang gi ro ches gcig yan char 'od skye zhing / kha dog dang / dkyil 'khor
42a1(mdo): dang / chu zheng skye zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang 'i myi nye bar 'gro ste/ nyi ma dang ni myo nye bar 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib ma chung ngur 'gyur te/ grib ma chung gyur pas/ dkyil khor/
42a2(mdo): de'i phyogs gcig snang bar gyur ra te/ de'i phyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang gi ngo ches gcig yan chad 'od skyed zhing / kha dog dang / dkyil khor dang / chu zher skye'o// ci'i phyir tha'i ba'i dkyil 'khor tshes
42a3(mdo): lpal rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad kyi nye bar myi 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyis nyes par myi 'gro bas/ de'i dkyil 'khor la bsgrib pa kang / yin
42a4(mdo): pa dang / nyi ma'i grib ma'i grib ma de dkyil khor slar log ste/ des de'i dkyil 'khor snang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil khor yang gi ngo ches bco lnga la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su
42a5(mdo): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gi dbu/ sa stog pa yod la/ mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa myed/ ce na/ smras pa/ gling gi rkyen gis de'i dbus rnyog pa yodal
42a6(mdo): chu'i rkyen gis mtha' rnam par ba zhing rtog pa myed de/ gribs sa gi gzugs nyan gang yin pa des mi dbus rtog pa yod la chu'i gzugs gnyan gang yin pa des ni yab rnam par rang zhing rnyon/
42a7(mdo): pa byed do// gzham yang zla ba'i dkyil de la kun dka' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams yod pas/ ro'i phyim yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ki dbus rnyog
42a8(mdo): yod la/ mtha' rnam par dang zhing rtog pa myed do// gang gi tshe 'jam bu gling du nyi ma shar pa de'i tshe/ shar gi sus 'phags su nyi ma bye'o// byang gi sA myi snyan na ni nyi ma nub bo// nub gi ba lang spyong gi gling/
42a9(mdo): na mir ma byed do// gang gi tshe 'jam bu gling du nyi ma byed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ shar gi lus 'phags pa na mi nyi ma chub bo// byang gi sgra gyi snyan mi ma byed do// nub gi ba yang skyong gling mdi nyis 'cha dzo/
42b1(mdo): gang gi tshe 'dzam bu kling na nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe/ shar gi lus 'phags na ni nam phyed do// byang gi s+phA myi snyan na ni nyi ma 'char ro// nub ki ba lang spyod nad kyi gling na ni nyi ma phye'o// kang gi tshe 'dzam pu kling na ni ma
42b2(mdo): phyed du gyurd pa de'i tshe/ shar gi lus 'phags gri na ni nyi ma 'char ro// byang gi sgra myi snyan ni na nyi ma bye'o// nub gi ba lang spyod na kyi gling na ni nyi ma nub po// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling thog mar smos te bshad pa de
42b3(mdo): bzhin du/ shar gi lus 'phags dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan dang / nub gi ba lang spyod kyang thog mar smos te/ thams cad brjod par bya'o// 'dzam bu gling gi shar phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar ki lus 'phags kyi
42b4(mdo): lho phyogs so// byang gi sgra myi snyan gi nub phyogs so// nub gi pa lung spyod gi byang phyogs so// 'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar ki lus 'phags ki nub phyogs so// byang gi sgra myi snyan
42b5(mdo): ki ni byang phyogs so// nub ga ba lang spyod gi ni shar phyogs so/ 'dzam bu'i gling ki nub phyogs gang yin pa re/ sha/ ra ki lus 'phags ki ni byang phyogs so// byang gi sgra myi snyan kaM ni/
42b6(mdo): shar phyogs so// nub gi ba lang spyod kyi ni lho phyogs so// 'dzam bu gling gi byang phyogs gang yin pa re/ shar gi lus 'phags kyi ni shar phyogs so// byang gi sma myi snyan ki ni lho phyogs
42b7(mdo): so// nub gi ba lang spyod ki chub phyogs de/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling thog mar smos te bshad pa de bzhin du byang gi snyan dang / chub gi ba lang spyod dang / shar ki lus 'phags kyang thog mar smos te/ brjod
42b8(mdo): par bya'o// phyogs ni bzhi yod de/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang // shar phyogs la shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod de/ lho phyogs
42b9(mdo): su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// lho phyogs la lho phyogs su 'du shes pa'i
43a1(mdo): sems can dag kyang yod/ shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// byang phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag
43a2(mdo): kyang yong ngo // nub phyogs la shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ lho phyogs la 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyog/
